description: How Mining Works For most users of cryptocurrencies it is not necessary to understand how the mining process in itself works, but it is fundamentally important to understand that there is a mining process to create the virtual currency. Unlike currencies as we know them today where governments and banks can simply choose to print unlimited amounts (Not saying they do so, just a point), cryptocurrencies has to be mined by users using a mining program that solves sophisticated algorithms in order to release blocks of coins that can go into circulation. This is part that makes the cryptocurrencies unique, as there is nobody who can simply press a button and get unlimited coins. Everybody can compete equally while mining coins, by buying the same equipment as one another.  The different cryptocurrencies uses different types of algorithms in order for the blocks to be released, but in general it is not something that you should be using your computer to do as it takes specific equipment to mine and it will provide you with a huge electricity bill compared to the profits you will be able to make from it. It is also worth noting that the more coins that has been mined from a cryptocurrency, the more difficult it gets to release new blocks and thus get new coins. The algorithms has been made this way, to ensure that all the coins would not be mined instantly and leave room for the currency to stabilize and not be over populated from the beginning, thus not having any significant value for anyone besides the miners.

description: Support us with Bitcoin: $15 - Get a Mycelium t-shirt $40 - Get a Mycelium Entropy device $50 - Get a Mycelium Entropy device, and a t-shirt $2000 - Get a Customized Business Pack Mycelium Entropy is a small USB device with a single purpose: Making it easy to create Bitcoin paper wallets in a secure controlled environment. Paper wallets are created in 3 simple steps: Insert Mycelium Entropy into a printer that allows you to print pictures from a USB flash drive. Select the print option on the printer. There is no step 3. This way the paper wallet has never touched a computer or a network, and as soon as you eject the device the private key is wiped from memory. Mycelium Entropy is the easiest and most secure way of creating a paper wallet for offline cold storage. How does it work? When Mycelium Entropy is inserted into a USB socket, it powers up and generates a large random number based on hardware entropy. That number is turned into a Bitcoin private key and a Bitcoin address. The private key and the address are turned into QR codes and and stored in a JPG file, and the USB device presents itself as a USB flash drive. This allows a printer that can print photos off a USB flash drive to print the paper wallet directly off the device. Here is a paper wallet sample: http://i.imgur.com/L36LZgY.jpg The hardware based entropy is collected by using a chip with static RAM as the source of entropy, as described in the scientific paper: Power-up SRAM State as an Identifying Fingerprint and Source of True Random Numbers (Holcomb, D.E.; Burleson, W.P.; Fu, K.). Quote from the article: " We demonstrate that a 512-bite SRAM fingerprint contains sufficient entropy to generate 128-bit true random numbers, and that the generated numbers pass the NIST tests for runs, approximate entropy, and block-frequency. " Because Mycelium Entropy collects entropy from tens of thousands of SRAM cells, the result is impossible to guess. Every time you plug the device into a USB port, the power-up process makes the SRAM cells contain a completely random state, allowing the chip to create a different high entropy random number. This allows you to make as many safe and secure paper wallets as you wish. When paired with the Mycelium Bitcoin Wallet, with its ability to spend directly from cold storage paper wallets, storing and using Bitcoin securely becomes very easy for anyone. Here is a video showing Jan, one of our lead developers, demonstrating the prototype: Mycelium Entropy will be 100% open source, and uses off-the-shelf components. It is fully programmable and more features can be added over time. We will make it trivially easy to flash the device using either firmware you download from us, signed with our key, or with your own custom changes to our source code. This is your guarantee that the device does not contain any malware or back doors. Flashing is as easy as plugging it in, turning on flash mode, and copying files over to the drive. You will be able to download the sources, make any changes, build your own and flash the device. From the very start Mycelium Entropy will, in addition to supporting classic paper wallets, also support 2-of-3 split private keys using a technique called Shamir's Secret Sharing. This allows you to split a private key into 3 paper shares, where any two of the three shares are needed to get access to your bitcoins. That way, if one of your shares gets lost or stolen, you can still combine the remaining two shares to get access to your funds. This is far superior to any password encrypted private key scheme. Here is a sample: http://i.imgur.com/CGHWIcS.jpg Going forward we plan to add the option of generating master seeds for BIP32 HD wallets as a downloadable upgrade. Mycelium Entropy will be made in Europe and assembled in Austria (known for its strict privacy laws), and will be shipped in a hologram sealed box to prevent tampering while en-route. Reason for Raising Money Although the device hardware is open source, we need to raise money to be able to order them in sufficient enough quantities to make them cheaper for everyone. Mass production is much cheaper than ordering them one at a time. Also, about $1,500 of the money raised will go towards testing and compliance for these types of devices, like CE marks, FCC part 15 approvals, etc. While the devices are being developed, we will spend time testing printers and putting together a list of recommended printers to use with these, just to make sure that yours can handle this, or if it can't, to help you find the cheapest (and most secure) option you can get. Stretch goals If we raise $30,000, we will add Litecoin support as a downloadable feature. If we raise $40,000, we will add the second more popular blockchain-based cryptocurrency by market cap, which at present is PeerCoin If we raise$60,000, wow. such money. very rich. have dogecoin. If we somehow miraculously manage to raise $120,000, we will forgo all sleep for the next two month, and get HD out by the time we ship these. Risks and challenges The device designs are finished, and the prototypes are fully functional. We also have manufacturers lined up, ready to assemble the units for us. We just need the funding to start the initial run of production. The only problems we may run into are related to the manufacturers, such as unforeseen production delays, though we believe they will be unlikely. Canon i560 - does not work Canon imageCLASS MF8280CW Color Laser - OK Canon Selphy CP910 - comes out plain white on multiple sheets Canon PIXMA-MG6250 - OK Epson XP-610 - OK Epson XP-810 - OK Epson XP-850 - OK Epson WF-2540 - No way to print photos from USB Epson WF-3520 All-in-One - OK Epson WF-3540 All-in-One - OK Epson WP-4540 - No way to print photos from USB Epson WF-7510 Wide-format All-in-One - OK HP Envy 120 Wireless - OK HP LaserJet Pro 200 Color - OK HP LaserJet Pro MFP M476dw - OK HP Officejet 6700 Premium - OK HP Officejet Pro 8600 Plus - OK HP Officejet Pro 8610 - OK HP Officejet Pro 8630 - OK HP Photosmart 7520 - OK

description:
My name is Robert Ross and I am the founder of FoldingCoin Inc. an Indiana non profit crypto currency applying blockchain technology to help support Stanford's Folding@home project in creating medicines for uncured diseases like Cancer, Alzheimer's, Parkinson's, and many more.

To get a better understanding I would like to explain what Folding@home is. Folding@home (FAH) is developed by Stanford University and has been running for almost 15 years. What  FAH does is has anyone in the world download a "protein simulation" program onto their PCs to simulate how proteins fold and unfold in the human body. The results of all this distributed computation is tabulated and analyzed to help new find new medicines and cures to some of the worst diseases faced by man such as Cancer. Anyone can donate their PC computational cycles as FAH is a 501(c)3 non profit and all the results are available to medical and scientific researchers upon request. This is a great way to help fight cancer without having to give time or money. The program runs in the background of your computer when you are not using it.

But there's a problem. There's no reward for sharing your computer cycles in this way. You can join a team and you can earn points, but there is no profit motive to help with research.

FoldingCoin Inc. was created to drive more participation to FAH by distributing the crypto currency FLDC (like Bitcoin) to participants of Folding@home. FLDC can be exchanged for BTC and BTC can be exchanged for US dollars thus giving a profit motive to fold. FoldingCoin Inc.

What is Bitcoin?

To explain in depth what Bitcoin is would take a long time on this campaign. Please watch the provided video for an excellent brief description of what Bitcoin and Cryptocurrency is.

What does Bitcoin have to do with medicine creation on FAH?

Thats simple, Bitcoin allows profit for running your computational cycles and FAH does not. Please watch this video for complete details on how this will work but I will put the main points here in the campaign page.

Lets take a look at the computational power of the three single biggest computational networks in the world:

  • The Worlds fastest SuperComputer = 33 PetaFLOPS
  • The FAH project = 48 PetaFLOPS 
  • The Bitcoin Network = 4,064,260 PetaFLOPS

Since there is a profit motive for people to contribute power to the Bitcoin network it has become 123,159 times more powerful than the worlds fastest supercomputer. The way Bitcoin became so powerful is because specialized hardware was created for Bitcoin mining called ASICs (Application Specific Integrated Circuits). Before the ASICs though there was enough computational power in general PCs to equal 330 PetaFLOPS.

Imagine if that power was harnessed for molecular protein folding. Most of this power was redirected to altcoin mining after the ASICs came out since that was the next profitable thing, and power was not redirected towards FAH since there was no profit motive for folding. FoldingCoin Inc. looks to bring a profit motive for people to fold proteins by distributing FLDC along with other Counterparty tokens. 

Venture capitalists could see this as an opportunity to invest in the creation of economic sized Anton Supercomputer, which is an ASIC molecular protein simulating machine that can fold more efficiently than standard computing hardware. This very thing happened to Bitcoin mining when it became exponentially profitable: venture capitalists invested in the creation of ASIC miners to compute Bitcoin at a more efficient rate than standard computing hardware.

So where is your money going to?

On January 5th 2015 I decided to go full time with developing FoldingCoin Inc. We have a great team of developers  that work on FoldingCoin Inc. on a purely volunteer basis. All of the FLDC devs still have full time jobs for income, but I no longer do. 

FoldingCoin Inc. has become popular enough where its success depends on one of us going full time developing it and I have decided to take that route. In the crypto currency world having a very active dev that responds to emails and forums quickly can be a crucial key. The money you donate will support my ability to continue developing FoldingCoin Inc. full time without having to get a job to pay my rent. I work 60-70 hours a week on FoldingCoin Inc. and I only need $10,000 dollars to work for 1 calendar year as my bills are split between 3 people and I have no children to tend to. This will equal to a little over $3 an hour for me all year. Its not much, but I can live very cheap :D 

Any excess of the $10,000 dollars will go directly to fund FoldingCoin Inc. I do wish to note that FoldingCoin Inc. will be running a crowd funding campaign later in the year with some great new innovations we wish to develop that will be very expensive. This campaign you are looking to fund is to ensure I can keep my focus on the missions of FoldingCoin Inc. so we can reach that point of doing a large crowd funding sale for FoldingCoin Inc. 

Another way I wish to bring in income is by helping Indianapolis businesses start accepting Bitcoin as a payment method and FLDC as a discount token for products and/or services from those businesses. I am only charging $100 for the service and this includes full training of the establishments staff on Bitcoin and how it works.

Projects like Bitcoin and FoldingCoin are fantastic ways to help improve our world and actually make charitable work profitable. If you do not wish to donate to this cause at this time I encourage you to help create medicines on your computer. It is a very easy two step setup to get started:

  • Step 1. Get a FLDC wallet
  • Step 2. Setup your Folding client
Most of the perks that I offer in this campaign require you to get a Counterwallet address. Please go to THIS LINK to setup your Counterparty wallet and email me your Bitcoin address found in the tutorial, setting up a wallet is free. If I reach my goal then any unclaimed perks of me setting up a business with Bitcoin acceptance will be donated to a local charity in Indianapolis and I will get them started with Bitcoin instead.Thank you and if you have further questions please do not hesitate to contact me via email rross@foldingcoin.net :)FoldingCoin Inc. was built to support Stanford's Folding@home but no direct partnership is established. FoldingCoin Inc. is independant from Stanford.

description:
For the past 2.5 years, I have been writing extensively about Bitcoin, Blockchains, Cryptocurrency and Decentralization, because I'm very passionate about these topics.

I was very lucky to have been directly involved along side other pioneers, technology leaders, entrepreneurs, startups, enterprise executives and practioners who are at the leading edges of this new technological revolution. 

This allowed me to produce a good amount of original thoughts that have been highly appreciated by a large audience, because it was helping them see the possibilities ahead. My work has been referenced in over 100 other publications or write-ups, a testimony to the quality of my thought leadership. 

I have given numerous presentations on the blockchain, Bitcoin, Ethereum, cyptocurrencies and decentralization.

This is me, speaking about the blockchain!

But many of my colleagues and friends kept asking me to write more, specifically a book. 

So, I decided to put everything I know, and more new research into 2 books, starting with what I'm calling "The Business Blockchain Series". 

Let me explain the blockchain, briefly.

If a new technological invention arrived and commanded an impact as profound as the Internet, every person would rush to pay attention, and ask: what do I need to know to understand it, and what are the implications I need to be prepared for?

The Blockchain technological revolution is that new invention, but it will enter the realm of business realization, only when everyone understands it and what it means for them.

So, what is the Blockchain? The Blockchain is a set of networked and cryptography-based technology infrastructure and programmable capabilities that facilitate a new category of trust-based services. These services can be created or exchanged without central intermediaries, affecting the flow of value and its lifecycle across assets, money, ownership, identity, rights, contracts, governance and regulation. Basically, the blockchain touches everything in society, business, and government.

In addition to the 50 blog posts I have already written on this topic, just in the past 12 months, here is a reading sample of some of the most significant pieces I have authored:

  • Why the Blockchain is the New Website (Forbes)
  • Blockchain 2015: Strategic Analysis in Financial Services (173,000 views on Slideshare)
  • The Business Imperative Behind the Ethereum Vision (Ethereum Blog)
  • How the Cryptoconomy Will be Created (Forbes)
  • After The Social Web, Here Comes The Trust Web (TechCrunch)
  • Understanding the Blockchain (O’Reilly)

I've already enjoyed great support via my blog readership that has skyrocketed in the past few months, but what's even more important to me is to connect with you, as someone interested in the blockchain's impact on our future, whether you wish to learn about it, or whether you are applying this technology in your domains of expertise. 

The Business Blockchain will be the first in-depth business book on the blockchain, written by someone who has been as involved as I have in this space, and with the breadth of knowledge and experience in the technology sector.

The second book, Centerless, will depict how Decentralization is compelling us to rethink trust, wealth and information. We will be impacted by an increased pace of decentralization, one way or the other.

Your support will enable me to self-publish these 2 books with the highest possible quality, while proving that the power of crowd funding and fan level support can trump traditional publishers and old-school distribution methods. And you will be the first recipients of this valuable work. The first book will NOT be available to the general public until April, and you will receive the second book 2 weeks prior to anyone getting it from Amazon.

Self-publishing these 2 books is important because it avoids the excessive delays of traditional publishers who require authors to freeze their manuscripts 6-9 months prior to publication. In the dog-years world of Bitcoin and the blockchain, this means that the published work may be already outdated, whereas a self-published book can be out in the market only 3-5 weeks after the last word is written. And that's my plan.

To professionally produce a single e-book, including book cover design, inside layout, copy editing, proofing, distribution and marketing, but not including printing and shipping, costs about $US 7,000.

All backers at the $US 48 level and higher will be invited to a private Slack channel, to follow progress on the 2nd book and collaborate, via opt-in. Slack members will receive some early content access.

Finally, I will also share drafts and excerpts of the work in progress on Wattpad, which is a powerful platform where readers and writers meet. I believe Wattpad is a solid community for receiving further feedback, and interacting with another segment of readers.

Here are the details about what will be inside these books:

The Business Blockchain: A Primer on the Promise, Practice and Application of the Next Internet Technology

The fundamental characteristics of blockchains are puzzling to consumers, corporations, governments, policy makers and regulators, because their implementation challenges centrally orchestrated trust, and enables a new kind of trust: one that is distributed, decentralized, from peer to peer, and not centrally managed by any single entity. Take any service, and add “without previous center-based authority”, and replace by “peer to peer, trust-based network”, and you will start to imagine the possibilities.

My goal for this book is to describe a future that is influenced by fundamental shifts brought upon by blockchain technology as the catalyst for change. However, that picture is only useful if you are convinced to be part of that change, and if you understand that the blockchain’s foray is inevitable.

We also need to be clear about the new roles and benefits of the blockchain, in a differentiated and augmented manner, and not merely seeing it as a replacement to something that already exists.

This book will represent a substantial blueprint for understanding how to frame the blockchain and how to uncover its related opportunities for change. It will be a call to action covering:

  • What is the Blockchain? 
  • Obstacles and Challenges 
  • Opportunities and Possibilities 
  • Blockchain Touch Points 
  • Consumer Scenarios 
  • Business Applications 
  • Implementing the Blockchain 
  • Seeing the Future 

Centerless: Rethinking Trust, Wealth and Information in the Age of Decentralization

Following The Business Blockchain, this second book will take you beyond the blockchain and into the world of decentralization, a powerful concept that redefines the role of the center by shifting power and control away from its previous constructs. With decentralization, centers will control less, but they will facilitate more.

Bitcoin and blockchain technology are necessary but not obligatory catalysts for this decentralization, because they are the enabling networks, technology infrastructure and facilitators of trust-based decentralized services.

We must not just ask what visible problems decentralization solves, rather we should let it create new opportunities, solutions and possibilities beyond what we see. The status quo doesn’t like to be disturbed, but it needs to be shaken in order to yield new results. 

This second book will go beyond helping you to understand the relationship between decentralization and our future. It will save you time trying to figure it out, and you will be able to discover new opportunities and benefit from them.

Key Themes in the book:

Part I Decentralization Theory

Decentralization is going to influence every corner of our world. To understand it, I will break down its various components to help you identify where change will be required.

Part II Trilogy of Decentralization Impact

Trust: Law, Governance, Services (e.g. Financial, Government, Trade, Healthcare)

Wealth: Economic production, Flow of value, Transactions

Information: Content, Privacy, Security

Part III Practical Implementations

Peer-to-Peer: The Edges of the Network Light Up Trust-based Systems and Services: Powerful, but Centerless The New Flow of Value: A New Supply Chain is Born Decentralizing Everything: There is a New Something for EverythingAutonomous Organizations: Putting Fiction into Reality Wealth Creation in the Cryptoconomy: Booting up a New, Sustainable Economy

If you’re at the center, you may live in a dilemma of restrictions, but you need to challenge yourself to figure out how to disrupt some of your central pieces and align them to the new flow of decentralization.

Decentralization is already here, but it hasn't been evenly distributed. Let’s be prepared.

description:
About the BitUnit 2015 seminar:

BitUnit Foundation will be organizing a Bitcoin-focused seminar in Dansoman- Greater Accra,  the City of Ghana. We will introduce Bitcoin and blockchain technology to the attendees. The Bitunit Foundation is determined to educate the masses on Bitcoin and other cryptocurrency usage and acceptance to improve their businesses and to help them understand the concepts of blockchain technology.
The event will be categorized into the following stages:
  1. Introduction to our newly founded BitUnit Foundation, our mission, vision, long term and short term goals.
  2. Introduction to Bitcoin, the importance of Bitcoin, Bitcoin usage and acceptance, and how to create a Bitcoin wallet.
  3. Introduction to Blockchain technology and its importance.
In addition, free meals and drinks will be included for the various participants. Participants will be issued certificates to show mastery in the crypto-sphere. Participation is fully FREE.

Our guest speakers:

Martin Albert (Bitalo.com): 
Martin is a full-time Bitcoin enthusiast from the very beginning of the cryptocurrency era. As a voluntarist, he thinks that statism is a crime and thinks about how to make the Bitcoin world a better place. For him, the most exiting thing is its political aspect - you and only you control your wealth. Having lost quite some Bitcoins in the past, Martin understood that centralized exchanges are in no way different than normal banks, where you give up control over your money. This inspires him to create a service for the Bitcoin world where the Bitcoins are always safe and in control of the users.
Robert David McLeod (Monetsu.com): Robert is an accomplished presenter and educator on blockchain technology. His diverse entrepreneurial background stretches over 15 years with projects ranging from technology, to finance, to building services, and community activism. Robert is currently the founder of the Silicon Valley funded blockchain startup Monetsu.com, is a former prize winner in the 2014 Bitcoin 2.0 Hackathon, and founder of the Vancouver Bitcoin meet up.

About BitUnit Foundation:

The foundation seeks to raise funds for upcoming events that will bring together the youth and ambitious and self-determined entrepreneurs enabling them to improve their businesses as entrepreneurs without government intervention.The Foundation's primary mission is to spread the Bitcoin gospel to the people of Africa and beyond. This is our first event and by attending the event, you will hear from speakers in the crypto-world, receive great knowledge about Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies, and have a lot of fun with other participants.

Donate to BitUnit Foundation with Bitcoin:

description:
See crypto contribution addresses here!
Read the covered story at CoinTelegraph.com!  We're making progress!

What is BuyAnyCoin, what's our vision?

BuyAnyCoin is a natural creation from the demand of the cryptocurrency market. So, what are doing? We are giving a physical face to a virtual product - and by doing that we are bridging the gap the digital currency economy has been bottlenecked by.  Merchants are accepting bitcoin faster than customers are spending it - but that is about to change!

*     *     *

Imagine this:

You walk in to your local convenience store, grab a drink and head to the register.  In your peripheral vision you catch a glance of a card on the counter, that says BuyAnyCoin Voucher. You ask the cashier about the card - she tells you, "You just redeem it at their website for any of the popular digital currencies like bitcoin".

Oh, sweet, you think to yourself.  This is awesome; I figured out how to get bitcoins a few months ago, but what a hassle!  This seems way easier - just grab the card and go.

*     *     *

Yes - 'figuring out' how to get bitcoin (or any other digital currency) has been one of the biggest hurdles to get over for someone curious about the technology.  Even die-hard geeks that understand how amazing it is to be able to manage your finances with futuristic tools and applications have had difficulty cobbling together a good plan to get started.  But these are just temporary problems; the internet made this technology possible, and now it is going to make it REAL.

There's no reason you shouldn't have the power and speed of digital currency at your fingertips while stopping at the gas station to buy a beverage.   With BuyAnyCoin's marketing strategy, the average individual is finally given direct physical access to a virtual product. This is the best gateway to adoption, giving the customer something they already know and connecting it to something they want to use; digital currency!

Digital currency is moving from the high-tech space to public relevance, and BuyAnyCoin is here to accelerate that transition by both understanding and appealing to real people.  Instead of asking them to change their habits to try something new, we're aligning with their existing habits and legitimizing the next generation of financial technology - literally before their very eyes.

Our company is not a bet on the success of Bitcoin alone, but rather an investment in the millions of people and billions of man-hours already spent building this unprecedented new industry which already blows the competition away.  Digital financial tech is ready to be put in the hands of the everyday consumer!

Your Dollars Making Sense

BuyAnyCoin is looking for $10,000 to engage our online retail market and finish development for our merchant partnerships. The money will also provide initial operating capital and enable a first-round production of our gift cards.
Development - We have a fast, stable, sleek web application that serves as the hub for our selected cryptos and assets (BAC Web App). What we need to develop is a merchant-accessible back end that will allow new merchants to sign up, receive cards and be able to settle balances on accounts with us. To ensure we can stretch our dollars the furthest we contract with a friend and developer in India who provides a great price-to skill-ratio.

Operating Capital - Every business needs operating capital; we are not unique in this charge. To be able to provide near-instant access to all of the digital currencies we provide, we will need to have a stock of them. This ultimately will require a small but liquid amount of money that can freely move in and out of digital currencies.
Gift Card Production - Our very first gift card run will be through a 3rd-party card manufacture costing us about $600-$800 for the first 1,000 cards. After we get our first cards and merchant partners, we'll acquire a printer to manufacture the cards in-house. The card printer we priced is $1,800 which will give us a better ROI per card in the long run than the 3rd-party solution.

PERKS PERKS PERKS!
If anyone has ever heard of Coinbase, they might remember that when they first got funded, they had over 20,000 applicants apply for positions. Well, a few of our perks are going to provide you direct insider access to BuyAnyCoin. We want you to get involved, see us grow and potentially become a valued member of BuyAnyCoin! What better reward is there than to donate to a growing company and be able to be a part of that growth from then on?
**We would love to give people some of our first round production gift cards but with regulatory concerns with money law restrictions we cannot do this, sorry!**

The Impact; The Social Significance

No fraud, no chargebacks, money anywhere in the world within seconds, unprecedented security of your money. The impact of widespread adoption of digital currencies is enormous. If merchants can save thousands and pass those saving to you by 10-20% off goods because they don't need a fraud department, why are you not using digital currency?  If you can send money to your best friend without massive fees, why are you not using digital currencies?

The answer is simple, BuyAnyCoin hasn't launched yet!  Right now, the hardest part about using digital currencies is acquiring them in the first place.  We're going to make this as easy as buying a bag of Doritos!

Everest In The Eyes Of BuyAnyCoin (aka challenges)

Our biggest challenge is going to be education of customers.  We are watching the adoption rate of bitcoin and other digital currencies rise around the world, but it will happen a lot faster when we successfully educate our customers.

This is why, as you can see in our introductory video, we promote the three primary benefits of digital currencies (Security, Logistics, and Irreversibility), and do NOT focus on price.  We will be putting out a blog post with an in-depth explanation of these primary benefits soon!

Wanna Help But Lack The Dough? No Problem...

We understand that not everyone can contribute financially to the company but that does not mean you cannot be involved and help!

We have tons of ideas that need to happen and we need people just like you, people that want to help make positive change. 

Here is a list of awesome projects and tasks we need help with regardless of money!

  • Social Media sharing:    FACEBOOK    TWITTER
  • Tell your friends and family about BuyAnyCoin!
  • Make a BuyAnyCoin account and provide feedback on features and usability!
  • Blog posts and PR - organic traffic is priceless!
  • Media kit designs

If BuyAnyCoin inspires you to contribute your time and effort towards our vision of financial evolution, definitely get in touch with us at team@buyanycoin.com!

The volunteers we need (but are not limited to)

  • Social Media Manager 
  • US based Javascript/Meteor Developer
  • Customer Service and Support

Prefer To Donate Your Favorite Crypto? (Awesome!)

See updates page for contribution addresses!

_____________________________________________________________________________

FAQ

Why we started the Company - We all recognized a vital missing link in the digital currency ecosystem and asked ourselves, if not us, who will make this a reality?

What problems do we solve - We are connecting to people with something they're already doing (this model is already being used to process billions of dollars with gift cards for products like iTunes and Facebook).  We are solving digital currency's biggest hindrance; getting it into the hands of the people in a way they are already comfortable with. We are the central hub and access point for digital currencies.

Why we will be successful - We know the market, we know what people want and we can deliver. Additionally, we have a pipeline of updates that will continue to empower our customers and only serve to strengthen our position. Our level of planning goes beyond a single year; we are thinking many years in the future and positioning ourselves to capitalize on the market when it catches up with our planning.

Thanks for your time!  We can't wait to start working with some of the ideas YOU bring to the table!

description:
Bitcoin has lost its way as it now has bodies governing how it should be run. It has lost its ability to be a true peoples currency as its flow is controlled by corporations with large mining farms that individuals cannot compete with.Bitcoin for all intents and purposes is now the same as CASH as it requires a BANK like structure of regulation and corporate influences to function.Rimbit is and always be, you and the person you trade with, which makes it a fully fledged peoples currency without all the restrictions of corporations and policy makers.Rimbit is the next generation in Digital Currency, allowing you to get involved while the project is in its early stages.

When you contribute and purchase a Perk, you help us continue to develop the Rimbit software/hardware ecosystem that will propel Rimbit as the Crypto Currency of choice in the years to come!

Rimbit has changed the playing field and anyone with just $2 can contribute to Rimbit and use our wallets easily and quickly and that is why Rimbit is quickly moving up the ranks as a valuable tool in the Crypto Currency industry!

Our support forum is at www.rimbitforum.com

Our forum is full of fantastic Rimbit users and has many tips and ideas for people wanting to get into Rimbit! We listen to what the community wants and we develop tools to meet those demands.

We have now setup Team Rimbit on Steam Rimbit is connecting with as many industries as possible and one of them is the Game Industry, which has a turnover that is larger then the Music or Movie Industry and as Rimbit involves itself with that market, we hope that Game developers, including Indiegames, take notice, watch our progress and involve Rimbit technology into their system. Click the Steam Logo below to view and join our TEAM!

Rimbit is a Digital Currency, much like Bitcoin, in fact, we used much of Bitcoin core code, along with code from other coins to come up with a unique Crypto Currency that makes it more stable and less susceptible to wild fluctuations.

A typical Rimbit Address looks like this- RGqzTy314psaQ59nmoFREYpeJ6xzwjDs2W

This is the easy part that shows how easy Rimbit is to use. Apart from the wallet, there is nothing else anyone needs to use as the wallet will do all sending and receiving as well as all the verifying and confirmation of transactions. Yes, we have made it very simple for everyone!
  1. Download a wallet from our Main Website http://rimbit.com/wallets/wallets-version-1-1-0
  2. Purchase a Perk at Indiegogo
  3. We have a fantastic forum of users just like you that can help you with problems. http://rimbitforum.com/
  4. We also have an Android Wallet that you can find using Google Playstore https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.rimbit.android_wallet

When you make a contribution to Rimbit, you are contributing to the continued development of new software, updated software and even hardware, for the use of Rimbit and in return, we will send you some Rimbit to use on the network, using the Software that your contributions have allowed us to accomplish.As time goes on, we will investigate and possibly develop certain hardware that can be used to "plug" into the Rimbit network and all this is possible from contributions that have allowed us the financial resources to expand development in many new and creative ways!Our goals for Rimbit over the next few years are:

  • Continue to improve the Rimbit Wallets
  • Add new features to Rimbit Wallets
  • Improve the Rimbit Infrastructure
  • Setup a governing body for Rimbit
  • Continue funding individual Rimbit Projects
  • Achieve full distribution of the 300 Million Rimbit
  • Disburse more Rimbit to schools (We already have one school using Rimbit to teach its pupils about Crypto Currency)
  • Continue charitable distribution of Rimbit to selected groups and organizations

We are just Developers

We are only developers and it is the community that own Rimbit. Every user is part of a peer network that helps each other verify transactions, all being done via the Rimbit wallet and is not subject to companies centralizing the coin, by controlling its distribution.

Rimbit, once its out, cannot be stopped and that is why it has an unlimited lifespan!

Rimbit is for You and for Merchants

Creating Rimbit started out after I had to close the option to sell my products with Bitcoin. As Bitcoin fluctuated so much, I was always at a loss as I didn't have time to constantly check the stock market and make risky decisions when to sell my Bitcoin. After all, I am a merchant, not a stock broker.

So I looked at the system and discovered that Bitcoin is a rushed mess of circumstances that have not been looked at properly and when discussing it with Bitcoin developers, it soon became apparent that they all know the problems, but choose to ignore some very major issues.

I then looked at every problem Bitcoin has and tested many ways to overcome them. The major problem Bitcoin has is mining, which the technology will soon have trouble keeping up, effectively slowing down Bitcoin and making it worthless in the years to come. So we removed the mining aspect and we discovered that Rimbit could be much more stable as its not reliant on many of the factors that are needed for other coins to continue evolving.

We found a way that everyone can use Rimbit, with just a simple desktop machine or Mobile Device and to verify each others transactions and this is where we had the "EUREKA" moment. Its at this point we knew we had to develop Rimbit and get it out to the public, before the inevitable problems with Bitcoin reared its head... It enables Bitcoin users to (when the time comes), jump the sinking ship and jump on board Rimbit which will last them forever, without any of the problems Bitcoin has.

Our Community

When you start using Rimbit, you will be part of a special community of users who are polite and care for each other and help solve problems, come up with new ideas and even build software to further enhance Rimbit. This community can be found at http://rimbitforum.com/

description:
As featured in Ars Technica , Digital Trends , Wired , Golem.de , Muy Computer and Cyberbloc . UPDATE: Now accepting Bitcoin, Litecoin and Dogecoin via our external site . All purchases made there will result in us manually contributing towards our goal here while the campaign is running. When the campaign ends, we will accept paypal and cryptocurrencies on the external site . What is Invizbox? Invizbox is a small, low power device that helps provide an easy-to-use method of protecting your privacy on the Internet.  You plug Invizbox into your existing router/modem. It creates a new wifi hotspot and you connect any of your devices (laptop, phone, pc, etc) to this hotspot. Our goal is to provide an easy-to-use & competitive price point for this device by drawing together off the shelf hardware and customised open source software solutions. Why do you need Invizbox? We all have a right to privacy, a right to protect our personal information, data, location and internet behavior.  You may think you have nothing to “hide”, or you aren’t doing anything “wrong” that would require investigation by third parties but neither do we. That doesn’t mean that we have to leave ourselves open to tracking and profiling by people, governments, companies, hackers etc. who we neither know or trust. Invizbox provides an easy solution to give you back control over who & what you choose to disclose your personal information to. Most people don’t know how to go about protecting their information on the Internet and with Invizbox you don’t need any technical know-how to gain that protection. Where are we right now? Referral Rewards Program Who are we? What we need to get off the ground So, What's the hardware? And the software? I'm worried after being burned by a similar project How are you achieving your low price compared to other products? Purchasing and shipping Where are we right now? We have already established a manufacturing and logistics supply chain to cope with demand. We have added Tor to the OpenWRT software on Invizbox and have also routed traffic through the Tor network. We're currently locking everything down and making sure the firewall rules are solid and there's nothing unnecessary running on the box. We will then move on to developing and enhancing the consumer ready, plug and play experience. Our goal here will be to make this effortless to you the end user and let you get on with normal browsing with significantly enhanced privacy. We have engineering samples in our hands and are amazed at just how small they are. They're tiny! Referral Rewards Program Invizbox for FREE? That's right you read that correctly. We want to reward our backers with either cash (paid through paypal) and / or free Invizboxes. How it works is really easy: Share your unique Indiegogo referral URL anywhere and everywhere (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn etc.) and let people know about Invizbox, how great it is and why your friends should buy one. For every $200 that gets pledged with your unique URL, we will give you $10 (that's only 5 unit pledges). If you reach the lofty heights of $1000 of referrals you will get an Invizbox for FREE and $30 via paypal. You get paid for doing what friends do best: being social! it could not get better than that. Find out more about how to share your referral URL and get more referral information here . Who are we? A 3 person team of computer science professionals with  wide and varied backgrounds which include software development, mobile internet security, lots of Linux experience and security specific qualifications. What we need to get off the ground: Because of our lower profit margins we hope to do a minimum run of 500 units and require 20,000 dollars for this. So, What's the hardware? WT 3020A device Dimensions: 65mm X 45mm X 22mm Supports Wifi b/g/n MAC address filtering Support for WPA / WPA2, WPA-PSK / WPA2-PSK. Support System: Windows / Mac / Linux Colours - White. Power via micro USB (cable included). 16MB flash 64MB RAM (note that we investigating using a slightly faster device, but you should assume that it's the one listed above for now) And the software? The router will run on a locked down version of OpenWRT with Tor. OpenWrt is an open source operating system / embedded operating system based on the Linux kernel, and primarily used on devices like this one. From the Tor project website: Tor protects you by bouncing your communications around a distributed network of relays run by volunteers all around the world: it prevents somebody watching your Internet connection from learning what sites you visit, and it prevents the sites you visit from learning your physical location. Our part in this is to properly lock down OpenWRT, add the latest version of Tor, add various routing configurations, add a user interface that allows people to set up various Tor config files automatically and in a user friendly way (e.g. for relays if people decide they would like to contribute to the Tor network). We will then QA this and hand it over to the manufacturer as an image for the router. We will be fundamentally altering the way the device would have normally worked. I'm worried after being burned by a similar project: Two of the project founders have security specific qualifications and all of us have many years of software industry experience and extensive Linux knowledge. We will provide documentation clearly outlining what the box is good for and especially what it's not good for . Do not trust your freedom or your life to this technology! It's not designed for that. The OpenWRT image will be properly locked down. No unnecessary daemons will be running on the box. To cover the possibility of intercepted units with rootkits, we will offer the ability to download and flash firmware directly from our site (with hash for verification). We're looking into tamper evident packaging but can't guarantee it. On the issue of hardware back doors: We're not manufacturing directly. We have been assured that there are no back doors and we will test for them, but as before you should not trust your life to this box and we will provide clear documentation covering that (and guidelines on what to consider if you need that actual anonymity). We can't stop browser fingerprinting. We are considering options to help here but for now we'll inform people on ways to avoid it if it's a concern. We're open to suggestion (see link below in the last bullet). If there are vulnerabilities found in Tor, we will patch our firmware and release an update. We have guaranteed logistics and hardware manufacturing capabilities for (within reason) any scale, but priority goes to the first 500 customers. Want to make your own with our firmware? No problem. We'll release full specs on the hardware so you can buy it. If you have questions, there's a thread over here on boards.ie. How are you achieving your low price compared to other products? Low profit margins. Purchasing and shipping: Where do you ship to? Anywhere. Shipping is included in the purchase price. (NOTE: Purchasers are responsible for any VAT or customs duties levied by their own countries). Thanks to Nina Szymanska for the amazing photography, Ray Woods for the lovely animation and Karl Vincent for the catchy music. Other languages sections are below here. Invizbox - Deine Privatsphäre im Internet schützen–leicht gemacht Was ist Invizbox? Invizbox ist ein kleines Gerät mit einem niedrigen Stromverbrauch das eine einfach zu bedienende Methode zum Schutz deiner Privatsphäre und Daten im Internet bietet.  Invizbox wird einfach am bestehenden Modem/Router angeschlossen, und schafft dann einen neuen WiFi-Hotspot mit dem alle anderen Geräte (Laptop, Telefon, PC, etc.) verbunden werden. Unser Ziel ist es, dieses Gerät einfach zu bedienend und zu einem wettbewerbsfähigen Preis anzubieten; erreicht werden soll dies durch die Zusammenführung von handelsüblicher Hardware und maßgeschneiderten Open Source-Softwarelösungen. Warum brauchst Du Invizbox? Wir alle haben ein Recht auf eine Privatsphäre, das Recht auf unsere persönlichen Informationen, Daten, Standort und wie wir uns im Internet verhalten. Du denkst vielleicht, du hast nichts zu "verstecken", oder du machst nichts "falsch" das eine Untersuchung von Dritten erfordern würde, und das denken wir auch. Aber das bedeutet lange nicht, dass wir uns für Tracking und Profilerstellung von Regierungen, Unternehmen, Hackern, Privatpersonen usw. offen lassen wollen, die wir nicht kennen und denen wir nicht vertrauen. Invizbox bietet eine einfache Lösung die dir wieder Kontrolle zurückgibt, damit du entscheiden kannst zu wem und wofür Du deine persönlichen Daten übergeben willst. Die meisten wissen nicht, wie man die eigenen Informationen im Internet schützen kann, und mit Invizbox brauchst du keine technischen Kenntnisse um diesen Schutz zu erlangen. Rewardsprogramm für Empfehlungen Invizbox GRATIS? Du hast richtig gelesen. Wir wollen unsere Unterstützer entweder mit Bargeld (über Paypal bezahlt) und/oder Invizboxes belohnen. Ganz einfach, so funktioniert es: du teilst deine einzigartige Indiegogo Empfehlungs-URL überall (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn etc.) und informierst so deine Freunde über Invizbox. Du sagst wie großartig Invizbox ist und warum deine Freunde das Gerät kaufen sollten. Für jede $ 200, die mit deiner einzigartigen URL verpfändet werden, geben wir dir $ 10 (das ist nur 5 Einheiten verpfändet). Wenn du die luftigen Höhen von $ 1000 in Überweisungen erreicht hast, erhältst du eine Invizbox GRATIS und $ 30 wird dir durch Paypal zugeschickt. Du tust einfach was Freunde am besten können: nützliche oder interessante Sachen empfehlen, und du wirst dafür bezahlt. Was gibt es besseres? Erfahre mehr darüber, wie du deinen Empfehlungs-URL teilen kannst und erhalte hier mehr Informationen. Wer sind wir? Drei Informatik-Profis mit breiten und vielfältigen Hintergründen, die Softwareentwicklung, die Sicherheit mobiler Geräte, sowie viel Erfahrung in der Programmierung unter Linux und IT-Sicherheit umfassen. Invizbox - Protégez votre vie privée sur Internet très simplement. L'Invizbox, qu'est ce que c'est? L'Invizbox est un petit appareil qui consomme peu et vous permet de protéger votre vie privée sur Internet d'une manière très simple. Il vous suffit juste de connecter l'Invizbox à votre routeur/modem. Elle va automatiquement créer un nouveau réseau Wi­Fi auquel vous pouvez connecter tous vos appareils (ordinateur portable, téléphone portable, PC, etc.) Notre objectif est de fournir une solution simple d'utilisation et à un prix compétitif. Pour cela, nous avons combiné du matériel relativement standard et des solutions logicielles basées sur du code source ouvert (open source). Pourquoi avez­vous besoin de la Invizbox? Nous avons tous un droit à la protection de notre vie privée, un droit à la protection de nos données et informations personnelles (photos, localisation, pages visitées sur Internet, etc.). Vous pouvez très bien penser que vous n'avez rien à cacher ou que vous ne faites rien de mal et donc que vous n'encourrez aucun risque. Nous sommes du même avis. Tout cela ne veut pas dire que vous ne devez pas vous protéger un minimum contre la surveillance et le profiling standard par des individus, gouvernements, entreprises, hackers, etc. que vous ne connaissez pas et en qui vous n'avez pas particulièrement confiance. L'Invizbox vous fournit une solution simple et vous rend le contrôle de vos données, vous pouvez à nouveau choisir ce que vous partagez et avec qui. La plupart des gens ne savent pas par où commencer pour protéger leurs données sur Internet et grâce à l'Invizbox, vous n'avez plus à vous poser cette question et à acquérir les connaissances nécessaires pour vous protéger efficacement. Programme de récompense L'Invizbox GRATUITEMENT? Oui, vous avez bien lu! Nous voulons récompenser nos contributeurs soit en liquide (payé par Paypal) soit avec des Invizbox gratuites. Pour cela, c'est simple, partagez votre lien de référence Indiegogo sur toutes les plateformes possibles (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Linkedin, etc.) et faites savoir à tous que vous aimez notre projet et pourquoi vos amis devraient tous y participer. Pour chaque $200 qui nous parvient par votre lien personnel, nous vous donnerons $10 (pensez­y cela ne fait que 5 Invizbox!). Si vous atteignez la somme impressionnante de $1000, nous vous envoyons une Invizbox GRATUITE et $30 par Paypal. En somme, nous vous payons pour ce que vous aimez le plus: être sociable! Plus d'informations sur le partage de liens de référence ici. Qui sommes­-nous? Notre équipe est composée de 3 professionnels de l'informatique avec une expérience large et variée dans des domaines tels que le developpement logiciel, la sécurité des réseaux télécoms et aussi beaucoup d'expérience sur Linux. Nous avons également récemment mis à jour nos qualifications en sécurité des réseaux. O que é Invizbox? Invizbox é um dispositivo pequeno, de baixa potência e fácil de usar que implementa um método simples de proteger a sua privacidade na internet. O Invizbox é ligado a um router/modem que você já possua, e vai criar um novo ponto de acesso wifi onde você poderá ligar qualquer dispositivo (computador portátil, telefone móvel, computador pessoal, etc). Com este dispositivo, o nosso objetivo é fornecer uma solução fácil de usar e com preço competitivo, conjugando o hardware disponível no mercado e software existente em código aberto customizado. Porque precisa do Invizbox? Todos temos direito à privacidade, direito a proteger a nossa informação pessoal, osnossos dados, a nossa localização e o nosso comportamento na internet. Você pode pensar que não tem nada a “esconder”, ou que não está a fazer nada “errado” que requeira investigação por outras partes, mas nós também não temos. Isso não significa que nos devamos expor a sermos seguidos e a que o nosso perfil seja acompanhado por pessoas, governos, empresas, piratas informáticos, etc. que não conhecemos ou confiamos. Invizbox fornece uma solução fácil para lhe devolver o controlo que de quem você é e da informação pessoal que você escolhe disponibilizar.

A maior parte das pessoas não sabem como proteger a sua informação na internet e com o Invizbox você não precisa de nenhum conhecimento técnico para conseguir essa proteção. Programa de recompensa por referência? Invizbox grátis? Sim, é verdade, leu corretamente. Nós queremos recompensar os nossos referentes com dinheiro (pago através do paypal) e/ou através de Invizboxes grátis. Funciona de forma bastante simples: Partilhe o seu endereço único Indiegogo em qualquer altura e qualquer lado (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn, etc) e dê a conhecer o Invizbox, quão fantástico é e a razão dos seus amigos deverem comprar um. Por cada $200 que for associado ao seu endereço URL único, daremos $10 (correspondentes a 5 unidades promessa). Se atingir o objetivo de $1000 através de referências, recebe um Invizbox grátis e $30 através do paypal. É pago por fazer aquilo que os amigos fazem melhor: ser social! Não pode ser melhor do que isso! Mais aqui . Quem somos? Uma equipa de 3 pessoas de profissionais da área das ciências computorizadas com largos e variados conhecimentos que incluem desenvolvimento de software, egurança em internet móvel, muita experiência de Linux e qualificações específicas em segurança. اینویزباکس چیست؟ اینویزباکس دستگاه کوچک و کم مصرفی است که راه حل ساده ای برای حفاظت از حریم خصوصی شما در شبکه اینتر نت فراهم میکند.شما اینویزباکس را به مودم یا روتر خود وصل میکنید و اینویزباکس یک شبکه بیسیم جدید برای شما ایجاد میکند که می توانید همه وسایل ارتباطی خود را از طریق این شبکه جدید به اینترنت وصل کنید.
هدف ما فراهم کردن راه حلی بسیار ساده با قیمت رقابتی با استفاده از سخت افزار آماده به کار و نرم افزار کد باز سفارشی سازی شده می باشد. چرا شما به اینویزباکس نیاز دارید؟ حریم خصوصی ، حفاظت از اطلاعات شخصی، داده ها، موقعیت مکانی و رفتار اینترنتی حق همه ماست. شاید تصور کنید که چیزی برای« پنهان» کردن ندارید یا کار« اشتباهی» نکرده اید که کسی بخواهد بررسی کند، ما هم چنین فکری نمیکنیم. اما به این معنا نیست که ما باید خودمان را  به سادگی  در معرض ردیابی شدن بدست سایر افراد، دولتها، شرکتها، هکرها و سایرین قرار دهیم. افرادی که نه میشناسیم و نه به آنها اعتماد داریم. اینویزباکس راه حل ساده ای برای بدست گرفتن دوباره کنترل اطلاعات شخصی شما، و اینکه چه کسی و به چه میزان به آنها دسترسی داشته باشد، فراهم میکند.
بیشتر افراد نمیدانند چگونه از اطلاعات شخصی خود در اینترنت محافظت کنند، با اینویزباکس شما نیاز به هیچگونه اطلاعات فنی برای حفاظت ازخود ندارید. برنامه پاداش معرفی اینویزباکس به دوستان اینویزباکس مجانی؟ بله درست خواندید. ما به حامیان اینویزباکس به صورت نقدی (پرداخت از طریق پی پال) یا با اینویزباکس مجانی پاداش می دهیم.بسیار ساده است: شما لینک اختصاصی ارجاع به ایندیگوگو رابه اشتراک بگذارید( در فیسبوک، توییتر، اینستاگرام، لینکداین و . . .) و اهمیت حفظ حریم خصوصی و اینکه اینویزباکس چگونه به سادگی این امکان را فراهم میکند به دوستانتان یادآوری کنید. به ازای هر ۲۰۰ دلارتعهد از طریق لینک اختصاصی شما(فقط ۵ تعهد) ما ۱۰ دلار پرداخت میکنیم. اگربه سقف ۱۰۰۰ دلار ارجاع برسید یک اینویزباکس مجانی و ۳۰ دلار ازطریق پی پال پرداخت میکنیم. بهتر از این نمیشود! شما برای کاری که دوستان به بهترین نحو انجام میدهند پول دریافت میکنید: اجتماعی بودن و اشتراک گذاشتن. بهتر از این نمیشود. پاداش ادجاع درباره ما تیم ۳ نفره از متخصصین علوم رایانه با تجربه و پیشینه گسترده در توسعه نرم افزار، امنیت اینترنت موبایل، لینوکس و مدارک اختصاصی امنیت شبکه تشکیل شده است. ؟"Invizbox”ما هو جهاز هو جهاز ذو استهلاك طاقة منخفضة يساهم في توفير وسيلة سهلة الاستخدام لحماية خصوصيتك على الإنترنت.
كل ما عليك فعله هو توصيل الجهاز بالمودم أو راوتر الإنترنت الخاص بك فيقوم الجهاز بإنشاء شبكة واي-فاي آمنة تستطيع توصيل أجهزتك الأخرى (الكمبيوتر المحمول, الموبايل, الكمبيوتر الشخصي ....إلخ) لتنعم بالحماية والخصوصية أثناء استخدام الإنترنت.
هدفنا هو توفير وسيلة سهلة الإستخدام وبأسعار تنافسية بدمج مواد بسيطة ومتوفرة واستغلال البرمجيات الحرة والمفتوحة المصدر ؟"Invizbox”لماذا تحتاج لدينا كل الحق في الحصول على الخصوصية وحماية بياناتنا ومعلوماتنا الشخصية أثناء تصفحنا أو استخدامن للإنترنت. قد تعتقد مثلنا تماما أنه لا يوجد سبب فعلي ل"الاختباء"، أو انك لم تفعل أي شيء يستوجب التحقيق من قبل أطراف ثالثة. ولكن هذا لا يعني أن علينا أن نترك بياناتنا متوفرة للتتبع والتنميط من قبل الناس، والحكومات، والشركات، والمتسللين(الهاكرز) أو اي شخص آخر لانعرفه

يوفر لك حلا سهل الإستخدام لتستطيع التحكم بما تقوم بنشره من بيانات وتحديد الأشخاص المخولين بالإطلاع على بياناتك ومعلوماتك الشخصية

معظم الناس لا يعرفون كيفية حماية المعلومات الخاصة بهم على الإنترنت ومع جهازنا فإنك لا تحتاج أي دراية تقنيةأو عجهد للحصول على هذه الحماية برنامج المكافآت بإمكانك الحصول على الجهاز مجانا! أجل "مجانا"! نحن نسعى لمكافأة داعمينا إما نقدا (تدفع عن طريق البي بال) أو بإهدائهم الجهاز مجانا.
لتنال المكافأة كل ما عليك فعله هو أن تقوم بانشاء الرابط الخاص بك لنشر منتجنا في كل مكان (تويتر, فيسبوك, انستاغرام, لينك إن .... إلخ)  وتعريف أصدقاءك وجميع من حولك بهذا المنتج, مميزاته ولماذا يحتاجون لاقتنائه.
لكل 200$ يتم التعهد بها عبر استخدام اللينك الخاص بك اللذي استخدمته لنشر منتجنا سوف تحصل على 10$. وإذا وصلت إلى 1000$ سوف تحصل على الجهاز مجانا بالإضافة إلى 30$ مدفوعة عن طريق البي بال
ليس هناك ما هو أسهل من هذا! سوف تحصل على المكافأة لمجرد قيامك بالتواصل الإجتماعي ونشر معلومات منتجنا. للتعرف أكثر على طريقة الحصول على الرابط الخاص بك لدعم منتجنا, يمكنك معرفة ذلك عبر تصفح هذا الرابط من نحن؟ نحن فريق من 3 أشخاص من خبراء علوم الكمبيوتر, ذوي خلفيات واسعة ومتنوعة والتي تشمل تطوير البرمجيات، وأمن الإنترنت عبر الهاتف النقال، والكثير من الخبرات في أمن أنظمة اللينكس ومؤهلات الحماية الإلكترونية.

description: Short Summary Utter.io is an Open Source software platform which uses cryptocurrency technologies to allow users to buy and provision virtual servers.  The platform also enables OpenStack operators to form compute cooperatives using a virtual appliance , allowing fast scaling and sharing of excess compute resources between trusted entities. This concept may be one possible solution to the challenges associated with achieving a globally federated cloud . Virtual servers for sale are advertised by the appliances on a compute pool . Purchases are done by sending Bitcoin to an address that corresponds to the size and type of instance needed by the user. The screenshot below shows a BItcoin payment address corresponding to an instance ready to be started by an Utter.io virtual appliance running on an account on HPCloud 's Las Vegas datacenter. The StackMonkey pool is the first of many cooperatives, and is intended to be the Wild West of compute pools. The pool is built for use by hackers, crackers, security researchers, developers, do-it-yourselfers, and the communities and technologies developed from their use of the system. Users wishing to launch decentralized software services such as DarkMail , OpenBazaar , Freenet , Tor , MaidSafe , Ethereum and more can start instances with pseudonymity on the coop's deployments, or smaller privately run cloud deployments. No accounts are needed to launch instances ! All code providing basic infrastructure services to the project will be Open Source and will be licensed under the MIT License . Learn More About the Vision If you are interested in learning more about the Utter.io vision, check out the longer-winded video below. I go through the history and future of the cloud, talk about the trust the blockchain brings us and how a computed trust based cloud gives us a path to a globally federated cloud anyone can use by simply clicking and paying. The distributed cloud paper I refer to in the video can be found here . Now you know why I had to build my own teleprompter for the 3 minute version: I talk a lot. Also, be sure to read Code of Trust , a blog post I wrote last year. It explains why our trust in cloud technologies remains a challenge for infrastructure architecture today. If you are interested in seeing the technology in action, check out the video my daughter Lily and I did doing a demo of Utter.io's features on StackMonkey. If we are successfully funded, a non-profit foundation will be established to manage the project and help establish a user-centric community for raising awareness and continued project development. Development Timeline The project is currently in beta, hosted on hosted on Github and is 100% Open Source. An instance of the pool controller is currently running at StackMonkey , and is hosted on Google AppEngine. The beta launched in October. The appliance is generally available for use by following simple instructions to install from Github. Users can set prices for the compute they wish to sell by configuring their local copy of the appliance. The image below demonstrates the setup of the appliance. Development over the next two quarters will focus on the decentralization of key services inside the framework, including: alternative platforms for hosting advertisement pools a flexible and reliable blockchain payment monitoring tool payment instances to manage auto-payments for deployments server/service authentication via bitcoin keys using bitauth / bitid decentralized SSL tunnel hosted on appliances for instance access numerous features related to security and reliability Support will also continue to be provided via community driven content, email support and contract work for entities wishing to deploy federated compute on their infrastructures.  New feature requests will be considered for special deployments. With funding, Utter.io sets a goal of adding over 100 providers in 30 countries to the StackMonkey pool next year. Rewards Physical rewards like stickers and t-shirts will be shipped using economy class shipping. We'll need to collect things like shipping address and shirt sizes from you. Account rewards like priority support and early access features will be done via a tokenized page on the website.  Please note that verifying your identity will be required when you collect the rewards!  If you are privacy sensitive, you may wish to simply contribute a custom amount to the project at the lowest reward level. The developer off-site is intended for developers only.  Ideally you are skilled in a wide array of infrastructure technologies and can contribute through architecture and/or coding.  If you'd like to purchase the development offsite for someone who might be interested, but can't afford it, we're more than happy to make arrangements for them. Post Funding If we are funded, StackMonkey and the Utter.io framework will have their IP assigned to a non-profit foundation to encourage continued innovation in development and expansion of network services. The minimum viable funding for the project has been determined to be US$49,000. This amount will allow for the two existing full time developers to continue working on the project for the next six months. If funding is over-goal, or we manage to raise more funding in another manner, I will use the amount to help forecast a budget for the foundation to use to hire additional developers.  Ideally we'd like a team of 6-7 people working on this full time, with a minimum of a year's burn available.  That puts the funds needed for payroll at about US$1M, given they were located in the Bay (assuming they worked on a discount, sadly enough). Given we're looking for efficiencies, we have decided it would be good idea to decentralize the team. This lowers living costs, allows for a wider range of skill choices, and provides a good life/work balance for the developers. We're planning on doing a foundation offsite every 4 months or so to ensure good execution on planning and helping build relationships. Opportunities are likely to exist in the future for raising venture capital for offerings based on top of the framework. After the foundation is well established, other developers and I may choose to become a part of efforts to produce commercial opportunities from the platform/network. There may also be an opportunity to do a crypto IPO for the project, which would eclipse the need to do a traditional fund raise for a commercial offering. Foundation Basics The foundation will raise money for development through a variety of means, including well defined and transparent corporate sponsored donations, conferences, schwag, feature bounties and more. The Utter.io Foundation will be self-governed and driven exclusively by user and developer participation.  Corporate interests will remain important, especially when considering their contribution to compute resources, but their impact and relationship with the system must remain transparent at all times. Remember, infrastructure was meant to be open, transparent and trustworthy! The Team Kord Campbell I'm originally from Oklahoma. I love creating obscure branding memes and frequently dream about the future of compute. I'm dedicated to developer-centric approaches to marketing products, as I am a developer myself. I code in Python and JavaScript, but I've also been known to write C code for my Arduino. I exited Grub to LookSmart in 2003 (my first visit to the Bay) and did a few other startups before moving back and becoming the Chief Evangelist at Splunk in 2007, where I founded the first Splunk devops conference. In 2009, I founded Loggly and served as the CEO there until 2012. I left the company after coming to an impasse with the board about its future. I'm thankful for the time I've had over the last 2 1/2 years. I've spent most of it focusing on improving my coding skills, doing a bit of OpenStack consulting and thinking about how to apply cryptocurrency trust to the cloud. I also authored and maintain a set of install scripts which have helped about 15K people install OpenStack for evaluation purposes. There is more information about me in my profile and on LinkedIn .  You can find me on Twitter , Github and a couple of blogs I scribble in from time to time. I confess that I wore a pair of house shoes while filming the main video. :) Mauro Stettler Mauro is from Switzerland and travels the world while working. He's a programmer and an OpenStack expert, skilled at building out high availability clusters.  He's on Twitter , Github and LinkedIn as well. Mauro has spent the last year working on Kili , a public cloud deployment of OpenStack in Kenya. He started helping with Utter.io back in August of 2014. "The main reason why I prefer working on Open Source infrastructure is because I don't need to rely on documentation or support to understand and solve issues.  The best documentation is always the code!" Advisors We have a few advisors helping us. They come out of companies like Redhat, Cisco, Rackspace, and Microsoft. Their infrastructure experience and grey hairs are helpful in guiding us when it comes to strategy, market positioning and future features. Resources There is a list of current security related features available on Github. Security remains an important risk and challenge to the project. Risks & Challenges The risks involved in the project include meeting developmental deadlines within budget, adequately addressing security issues (link just above this section), maintaining stability of the infrastructure we run for others (like on HPCloud) and a wealth of other software development related issues. There's also the matter of setting up the foundation in a way that is acceptable to all parties involved, including backers, developers, users and providers. Finding a good balance to the foundation's 'knobs' will be critical to the future success of the project. If we run into issues at lower funding levels, the software may not be able completed to everyone's satisfaction. We may need to find alternatives to funding and completing the codebase. Given the project is Open Source, the risk of the project going away completely is greatly minimized. I'd like to thank you if you've read this far. Have you watched the main video all the way through to the end? The last 30 seconds or so of the video is actually the beginning.

description:
Help us defend against a trademark troll

Have you heard of Bitcoin? Well Litecoin is also a digital currency, just like Bitcoin.You could say that Litecoin is to Bitcoin, what Silver is to Gold.

Both Bitcoin and Litecoin are open source technologies - not owned by a single person, company or organization. That's a good thing!

Unfortunately someone has decided they want to own the trademark of the name Litecoin in the European Union. 

Is this wrong? Well, a simple comparison would be if someone tried to trademark the name Internet. Doesn't sound very nice does it?

On November 20, 2015 the period of opposition will close

So we don't have much time. Today there is one opposition which has been raised against this trademark, but unless there are enough strong arguments to oppose this trademark, then it's likely that the name Litecoin will be trademarked in the entire European Union. That's why we need to file this opposition as soon as possible. The only thing standing in our way is the €350. 

We need your help to raise €350

€350 is the fee for filing an opposition with OHIM - the organization responsible for handling trademark issues in the European Union.

€350 is about $360. We are raising $500 because it's Indigogo minimum. Any surplus will be used to pay for flowers to any lawyers who help with formulating the opposition.

This is the opposition we need to file to try and protect against this trademark trolling: http://bit.ly/1PG8JSx 

So, what do you get from all of this?

The satisfaction of helping in a good cause - defending against trademark trolling and keeping open source technology and information free and available to everyone.
We also hope that, if successful, this opposition will be useful in protecting against future cases of trademark trolling against digital currencies.

Help spread the word

We are super happy for any help in spreading the word about this case.Blog about it, Tweet and Facebook about it! Thanks!
description_summary: Help us defend against a trademark troll Have you heard of Bitcoin? Well Litecoin is also a digital currency, just like Bitcoin.You could say that Litecoin is to Bitcoin, what Silver is to Gold. Both Bitcoin and Litecoin are open source technologie
subtitle: Someone is trying to trademark 'Litecoin' in the European Union. Please help us defend against this.
title: Protect Litecoin from trademark trolling

description:
Who is Red Harbinger?

We are a veteran owned and operated group of guys from all over the world who are very passionate about breaking the limits of what is currently offered in the computer case market.  Most people who have heard of us know us from the Cross Desk, a full computer desk that doubles as a dual PC case with ample room for liquid cooling systems, 2 full pc setups, and more storage than most people will ever use in their lifetime - all wrapped in a killer looking design.  We are a small company that thinks very large scale.  We have been fortunate enough to see a lot of traction with our designs in the past few months with HGTV and the DIY Channel and sites like PCWorld, Maximum PC, and PC Gamer taking interest in the versatility of our designs.  We constantly strive to break the mold with our PC designs - and we'd love your help!

What is Dopamine?

In short - Dopamine is the world's first actual computer case designed specifically with mining in mind.  As a happy byproduct of its design, it works just as well for extreme gaming setups and test bench purposes! 

In the past couple of years cryptocurrency mining has exploded. Today there are numerous types of mining that are suitable for everyone from average PC users with a decent computer to massive companies with server farms dedicated to the task.  Bitcoin, Litecoin, Dogecoin and many others have been in the headlines for what seems like an eternity now - but surprisingly not a single reputable PC case company has come to the table with dedicated cases that have been optimized and tailored for mining - and those few "cases" (mostly cobbled together using a complex and confusing series of metal rods) that do exist are extremely expensive for what you receive, difficult to assemble, and the majority of them are a complete eyesore.  Because of the cost vs. value of what is currently on the market, some people have even gone so far as to use modified milk crates and clothing racks to house their mining rigs.  Dopamine aims to solve this problem.

Features include:

  • High Quality Materials and Construction - Manufactured in the USA.
  • Multi GPU Support - 6 GPU expansion slots
  • Spaced Expansion Slots - allow for airflow around GPUs to assist in cooling
  • Multiple Form Factor Support - supports mini-ITX, micro-ATX, ATX, and extended ATX motherboards
  • Dual Power Supply Support - compatible with all standard ATX power supplies
  • Triple 120/140mm Fan Support - provide airflow allowing for assistive ambient cooling
  • Built-in PSU Shroud - hide unneeded PSU cables allowing for increased airflow and aesthetics
  • Built-in Cable Management - allows only the cables you need to be seen and connected 
  • Stackable Design - cases are scalable and can be easily stacked to fit any desired mining setup.
  • HDD/SSD support - compatible with all standard 2.5" and 3.5" drives.

No clue what this cryptocurrency mining is all about?  No Problem!

As hard as it is for us to believe sometimes, we realize that there is still a significant number of people who know very little about this subject aside from what they may have seen in news headlines.  We won't get into the myriad of benefits that cryptocurrency mining provides here, but we will say - regardless of whether you buy Dopamine or not, we'd suggest doing a bit of research on the topic to familiarize yourself if you haven't.  A bit of education is never a bad thing right?  And these days, it's very easy for an average PC user to dive right into mining and start reaping the benefits.

While Dopamine was designed with scalable mining systems in mind, versatility is always a key component of Red Harbinger's cases.  With that in mind, this case can also easily be built into an open air gaming PC, a test bench for hardware testing, or any other type of PC that you can think of.  Easy access to core components makes upgrading and adding parts a breeze.

What we need & what you get:

In order to proceed and be successful with this product, we have to hit an acceptable price point in manufacturing so that we can offer a fair price for the quality of goods that you'll recieve.  With low production quantities, the price per unit increases. So, like every other product, more = better.

As early adopters, your contributions will come at a lower-than-retail cost, and your investment will go into packaging, printing, hardware (nuts, bolts, screws, switches, grommets, etc), powder coating, manufacturing, assembly, shipping parts, tooling fees, designer costs, advertising, and distribution.  

To keep things interesting, we've gathered a bit of help from some of our friends and have lined up some pretty sweet rewards, including:

  • A chance to hang out with the Red Harbinger crew and our friends Vanilla Ice and 3x UFC World Champion Jens Pulver while filming and live streaming the release announcement of our next product
  • Special early adopter pricing
  • Limited Edition White Dopamine cases
  • Discounts on purchasing multiple systems
  • Fully loaded turnkey Dopamine systems that are ready to be plugged in and start mining 
  • Custom powder coat color schemes
  • Special forum access on the Red Harbinger website
  • Access to Red Harbinger's team and products - see our products in the development stage before they are publicly announced - voice your opinions throughout the design process
  • Early access and options to purchase all future Limited Edition products before the general public

The Impact

By supporting Red Harbinger's Dopamine case, you are directly and indirectly assisting the mining community's growth.

Your contribution also assists the evolution of function into function and form; no more milk crate Franken-cases or strictly utilitarian and less functional designs.  Much like ugly 90’s websites that “did the job” and glittery blinged out Myspace pages, we'd like those to be a thing of the past.

Although Red Harbinger is a small team -  we know what we are doing.  We are everyday folks with traditional jobs, the same as all of you - but we have the experience of globally releasing the most complex PC case ever designed (The Cross Desk).  With only 5 employees, we have managed to amass customers in Australia, New Zealand, Germany, Spain, UK, Canada, Mexico, United States, Netherlands, Sweden, Singapore, and Korea and a global community following that is MUCH larger.  We want to continue this trend by getting fresh ideas to market - and only YOU can help us achieve this. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Without a doubt, Red Harbinger was built by the Internet Community at large sharing our designs, ideas, and love of taking something PC cases to the extreme.  Even if you can't assist financially, we would LOVE to have you help our cause by sharing this project on your social media pages.

By sharing, you are helping a group of everyday people do our part to continue ending routine and boring ideas.  Routine stuff sucks.  Dopamine is awesome - and we would really appreciate just a quick shout out to your friends and family to show them that a veteran based company is doing their part to make some waves.
