description:
What is Rimbit?

Rimbit is a Digital Currency much like Bitcoin and it was built by Bitcoin users who could foresee that at some time, Bitcoin would fail as it was built by techies for techies, with little regard to the common people.Bitcoins is failingBitcoins biggest problem is that it is mined and with it comes some statistics that show the 21 companies (not the community), now control Bitcoin with the top 3 companies being China basedQuote:This decentralisation has huge benefits, but also comes with new risks: Right now, if just the top three organisations joined forces they would control 51% of the network — giving them the power to rewrite the blockchain as they see fit.Source: http://uk.businessinsider.com/bitcoin-pools-miners-ranked-2015-7

Why Rimbit is different

Rimbit is not mined and that simple process alone is the only way forward with Digital Currency. Being "not mined" means that the only people to control Rimbit is the community.Not mined? Then how is Rimbit verified and confirmed?With Bitcoin miners verify and confirm transactions.With Rimbit, the community confirm and verify transactions.Every Rimbit wallet, apart from Android wallets has an option that lets the wallet perform verification and confirmations for the network, as long as a wallet is online and allowed to do those 2 functions.Inside the Rimbit core code is a function that allows the wallet to know when it is online and helping the network perform transactions and when it has successfully assisted the network, the wallet will then internally issue "stake" back to itself in form of newly created Rimbit. This Stake is set at 5% per annum and is created by the users wallet and deposited directly back into the users wallet. (Some news outlets cannot grasp this simple process and negatively report otherwise)Bitcoin is finite, meaning that there will only be 25 million coins ever in existence.Rimbit has the "stake" function and will allow new Rimbit to be created at a maximum increase at 5% per year, which means it will grow as more users start using RimbitHow is Rimbit development different to Bitcoin?Bitcoin develops its core code via donations to the project. That is why Bitcoin is essentially broke! http://www.geek.com/news/the-bitcoin-foundation-is-essentially-broke-says-new-board-member-1619795/Rimbit pays its developers via a percentage of the income generated via selling of Rimbit to the public, so as more Rimbit is sold, so increases the development of Rimbit.

Get a Wallet

Rimbit Wallets are free and we use contributions from users to update and improve wallets as it is our policy to put funds directly back into the continued development of the Rimbit Ecosystem!

Rimbit is the ONLY Digital Currency that can survive long term. PERIOD!

Rimbit was built by Bitcoin users, who saw the issues confronting Bitcoin and we have been warning Bitcoin users for a long time, but it has fallen on deaf/greedy ears and the only solution we could come up with was to instead build a Digital Currency and fix the issues, as controversial and misunderstood as it may seem.It is now that the media is starting to heed our warnings and reporting on the issues we have been presenting to the Bitcoin community, well before Rimbit was built.http://www.coindesk.com/five-biggest-threats-facing-bitcoin/In another well respected article - Quote:Once seen as a better investment than gold, the digital cryptocurrency is experiencing some severe existential threats.Source: http://www.newstatesman.com/future-proof/2015/01/slowly-surely-bitcoin-appears-be-falling-apartRimbit is Bitcoin with the mining removed. It is that simple and it is also that removal of mining that makes Rimbit controversial, because the mining community cannot profit from it... at all!

We started out in mid 2014

In mid 2014 we started a Crowdfunding project after being disappointed in Bitcoin as we began to consider its long term ability to function for the community.

It took a lot of brainstorming and coffee to work out how to make the changes we knew that needed to be done and with the hindsight of Bitcoin, we had a "Eureka" moment and the rest is history!

So we looked at what a Digital Currency needs to to do, to work alongside the USD, CAD, AUD, EURO and other Fiat Currencies. We knew that mining needed to be removed from the core of the code as it is a fruitless endeavor, aimed at stifling a Digital Currency with its obsessive and expensive need to use specialized hardware to maintain the blockchain

Rimbit Roadmap for 2015 and Beyond

We are always working on developing new improvements to all the wallets and that part will never change, as it needs to be done as technology improvements and conditions change.

  • With the communities help, push Rimbit to a $3.00 USD value
  • Continue to build the Rimbit community through hard work and via the amazing support given by current Rimbit users who are building the network, inviting friends and family into the project, so everyone involved early on can prosper in the years to come
  • Design and build tools for merchants to trade with, such as shopping carts for various platforms that will also include our mapping system
  • Develop a trust platform via the Rimbit Blockchain to give users and merchants some indication of the others value to the community.
  • Continue to support school projects in every possible manner, as Digital Currency holds promise for the future as a tool to replace and or work with current fiat currency (USD, CAD, AUD, EURO etc...)
  • Build and infrastructure to allow the community to take over the project at a certain point and we take a backseat, We will be handing over servers, Rimbit and staff to be managed solely by the community,
  • Analytic's are now at http://rimbitforum.com/analytics/

So what do I get with a Contribution?

Contributions to Rimbit are used for Research and Development of Rimbit wallets, whether they be updates to current wallets and websites or developing new products such as wallets for NAS servers, online wallets and accounting packages, all as free products for users of Rimbit to use as they please.

Your contribution, no matter how big or small, tells us that we have always been on the right path, building what we do and we appreciate your confidence.

We have been developing publicly since mid 2014 and we have a forum that we manage around the clock where users can get together and discuss the future for Rimbit as it is a community project and we are merely overseeing it in the early stages.

With each contribution, we do suggest that you download a Rimbit wallet in our downloads section, because once we have recieved your contribution, we will email you back (so make sure you check your spam/junk mail folder) and ask you for your Rimbit Wallet Address, so we can send you Rimbit based on your contribution level, which is xxx RBT

If you need support, please visit our forum at http://rimbitforum.com and view our tutorials or read the posts that may have the answers you need. If not, simply register on the forum and ask your question and we or a forum member will answer you as soon as possible.

So join our campaign, spread the news and watch Rimbit slowly climb the ladder to be the number 1 Digital Currency

Video Tutorials:

Downloading and installing a Rimbit Wallethttp://rimbitforum.com/video/view/17-download-and-install-a-rimbit-wallet/Sending and Receiving from your Rimbit Wallethttp://rimbitforum.com/video/view/18-sending-and-receiving-from-your-rimbit-wallet/Confirmations (update on previous Video)http://rimbitforum.com/video/view/19-confirmed-transaction/I can also confirm that Rimbit works flawlessly with Windows 10, but just remember to create a backup of your wallet at all times.

Main Website:http://rimbit.com/Forum:http://rimbitforum.com/

description:
I am creating the course that I would have wanted to take when I
first became interested in Bitcoin, and writing and publishing a
companion e-book and zine entitled “BYOB: Using Bitcoin to Be Your
Own Bank.” After spending the last two years learning about bitcoin
from the brightest minds in the industry and teaching this knowledge
to others through my website bitcoinconsultant.me, I've decided to
bring this knowledge to Kickstarter, just in time for the holidays.
Whether you make it your New Year's Resolution to learn about bitcoin, or want to pass the gift of knowledge and monetary freedom
along to someone you care about, this course and e-book will be a
great way for beginners to learn about bitcoin. What material will be covered? Learn about what bitcoin is, how it works, why it's important, and
how to use bitcoin to take control of your money and “Be Your Own
Bank.” We will go step-by-step through the process of creating a
wallet, buying and selling bitcoins, and storing bitcoins in a way
that will protect them from online hackers. Students will also learn
how to use bitcoin for non-monetary purposes, such as the secure
timestamping of documents and other digital files. How is this different than the courses and books already available? While there are several great books and online courses out there that do a great job at explaining what bitcoin is and telling its story, none have been focused on practical uses for bitcoin (that I know of, anyway). This is where BYOB is unique. The BYOB online course and companion book will still introduce students to the basic history and technical concepts behind bitcoin just to provide some context, but will mainly be focused on using bitcoin in the real world as a way to transact and store value without relying on a third party - a way for people to "be their own bank." Do I have to attend the online course at a specific time? Students will be able to watch the videos that are posted on their
own time as many times as they want, and can contact me through the
course or my website for email support. Why I am the right person to teach this course and write this
book: I have been helping investors,
	businesses, and casual users learn about bitcoin for over two years
	through face-to-face and online education sessions. Since opening bitcoinconsultant.me to the general public in March 2013, I have
	published blog posts that have reached thousands of people, and have
	individually helped dozens of people who have contacted me through
	the website. On July 4, 2013, I started
	Buttonwood SF, the first and only trading-focused cryptocurrency
	meetup in San Francisco, which has over
	250 members and has seen
	notable figures in the Bitcoin and digital currency community stop
	by to conduct trades and
	teach attendees about the technology. When I first got interested in bitcoin, it took me over six months to understand it and then buy my
	first bitcoins. I want to cut this down from months to hours or days
	for students. Risks and Challenges The biggest challenge will be
delivering the course content and e-book on time; the due-date is
currently set for January 15 th . I will overcome this
challenge by setting aside several hours per day starting the day the
crowdfunding campaign ends to write content and film instructional
videos. I already have a course outline and have a lot of content
spread across multiple blog posts, presentations, and interviews I
have given which will be combined with the up-to-date content to
produce the book and the online course. Since Bitcoin is a constantly
evolving technology, after the course and book are finished I will
continue adding content as relevant information comes to light and
new insights are gained. Other Ways You Can Help Bitcoin donations accepted here: 1Pcnz9FdshVprHzCcy7g5dMoWj17XzwAuW If you would like to pay for the e-book, physical zine, or online course via bitcoin, please send me a private comment and I will send you an invoice. After the invoice is paid, I will add you to the list of people to send access codes to. Even if you can't contribute financially, you can help by sharing this Indiegogo campaign with others via email and social media. Additionally, if you have relevant experience and would like to help with the design of the cover, layout, and formatting for the e-book, please get in touch. Thanks for your support!

description:
**So far we've raised 3.21 bitcoin!  Our grand total is $2022!  That's 29% of our goal!!!** 

Send the Liberty Beat to NYC to Report on the Ross Ulbricht Trial!

               "I get updates on the Ross Ulbricht trial exclusively from                The Liberty Beat and John Bush. Bush is dedicated to                truth about the key criminal trials that affect our freedom                -- which is perhaps why the mainstream media is looking away".                                   - Millie Thompson (Antonio Buehler's Attorney)

The Liberty Beat daily news service is raising money to provide you with full in-depth coverage of the Ross Ulbricht Trial with reporters on the ground during the entirety of the trial.  Money we will raise will pay for travel costs, living expenses, advertising, graphic design, live blogging, and other activities supporting our coverage.  We will also have writers and staff support back at in Central Texas writing stories and compiling information from the trial and coordinating advertising, outreach, and fundraising efforts. 

Everything we raise above our goal will be split 50/50 between the Free Ross Legal Defense Fund and ongoing media and activist efforts to bring attention to Ross Ulbricht's ongoing legal battles.  

Our coverage of the first week of the trial reached hundreds of thousands of people, providing them with breaking news and a perspective and depth of knowledge they won’t find on other media outlets.  

About the Case

               John Bush is the only journalist I interviewed with                the first week of Ross' trial. I look forward to more                of his good work." - Lyn Ulbricht (Ross' Mother)

Ross William Ulbricht is facing federal charges associated with his alleged involvement with the Silk Road marketplace, a dark net website that allowed users to buy and sell illicit goods.  The case has big implications not only for Ross and his family, but for the future of internet freedom as we know it.  The State is attempting to hold Ross responsible for the actions of users on a website he created.  If they are able to do this, it sets a dangerous precedent that other webmasters and site owners may be legally responsible for their user's behavior.

For those that know Ross Ulbricht, he is a good person and no criminal.  He is now facing 30 years to life in prison.  Regardless of the level of involvement he had in the building or administering the Silk Road website, he does not belong in a cage.  

Also at stake is the age old battle of freedom vs. control.  The Silk Road, Bitcoin, TOR, and encryption represent major threats to the powers that be and this trial is one of the first cases where all of these technologies are being brought in to the public spotlight.  The outcome of this case will impact the way the public views these radical technologies. 

How You Can Help

Let The Liberty Beat be your eyes and ears on the ground in New York City.

1. Donate via Credit/Debit Card or PayPal - choose one of the perks to the right or donate any amount through the IndieGogo

2. Donate with Bitcoin - To receive a perk and donate with bitcoin, click here!

To donate bitcoin with no perk. send btc to this address: 

182YuaV7Kn6V9fPSuMhBvm4CWfvNeCmacG

3. Donate Frequent Flier Miles - this will cut our trip costs significantly!  If you can donate miles, please contact us through our IndieGogo page.  

4. SHARE this with your friends, talk about, blog about it, invite us to do an interview.

Coverage

               "Liberty Beat has done a fantastic job covering                the Ross Ulbricht trial. The world is a more informed                place thanks to their work." - Roger Ver

Check out our LIVE BLOG PAGE with breaking updates from multiple news outlets:

http://thelibertybeat.com/silk-road-trial-coverage-ross-ulbricht/

Check out the stories the Liberty Beat has written about the case thus far: 

http://thelibertybeat.com/?s=silk+road

Listen to the SovereignBTC podcast about the trial, what's at stake, and the activism surrounding the case:

https://letstalkbitcoin.com/blog/post/sovereign-btc-51-silk-road-trial-represents-ongoing-struggle-between-freedom-and-control

$500 - One Month Sponsorship of SovereignBTC Podcast Silk Road Trial Coverage - You will get a 30 second audio advertising spot per episode on the SovereignBTC Podcast on LetsTalkBitcoin.com heard by thousands of people every week.  The podcast will be covering the trial with audio updates, interviews, and philosophical musings.   See the show feed here.

How Donations Will Be Spent

description:
ICT - Secure (under using the following tools like Tor; i2p; FreeNet; PGP; S/MIME and for save money transaction we use BITCOIN with a integrated User Interface to create necessaries accounts and security keys) protects you by bouncing your communications around a
          distributed network of relays run by volunteers all around
          the world: it prevents somebody watching your Internet
          connection from learning what sites you visit, and it prevents
          the sites you visit from learning your physical location. Internet privacy involves the right or mandate of personal privacy concerning the storing, repurposing, provision to third-parties, and displaying of information pertaining to oneself via the Internet. Internet privacy is a subset of computer privacy. Privacy concerns have been articulated from the beginnings of large scale computer sharing. We believe that privacy is a fundamental human right that must be 
protected at any cost. The advent of the internet has now made all of us
 more vulnerable to mass surveillance than at any other point in human 
history. The disappearance of online privacy is a very dangerous trend 
as in many ways privacy and freedom go hand in hand. Me, Peter, i work since 1982, so i can say i grow with computer, i did work with the simple PC until even IBM Mainframe. I learn about about the use and even about the problem’s. I been focused  on UN*X and later Linux, what else you can trust in security, speed and performance.  Please feel free to check out my profile at Linked In to get a idea about my knowledge and the work i did until now. We want us our knowledge and idea to make the internet more secure and private as is its was years before. A free and democratic society has to have the possibilities to further develop and renew itself. Because of this, a society is in need of controversial discussions and experimenting. Every individual should be able to evolve freely in a society. The rights to freedom of expression without bringing disadvantages to herself/himself, the protection of privacy, freedom of assembly and access to media for all citizens are increasingly influencing the digital society. These rights also build the foundation for informational self-determination and data privacy. As long as there is no law or right opposed to self-determination concerning which data someone has to expose about herself/himself, we will ensure that this is possible. The main concern is to support the practical aspects of data privacy. We don't only want to have the right to informational self-determination, but we also want to actively exercise this right. We cover themes ranging from "how to browse the Internet with leaving as less traces as possible", "anonymous web browsing", "data and email encryption" to "bypassing Internet censorship". We give you the facility to browse, to exchange email and chat anonymous, safe and with a good feeling if you use the internet. We offer you a VPN, which connect you direct to one of our VPN Servers and give you access to the net and also to the "Deep Web" . Deep Web (also called the Deepnet, Invisible Web, or Hidden Web) is World Wide Web content that is not part of the Surface Web, which is indexed by standard search engines. We guaranty Point To Point Encryption for email, chat and voice. You can choose FreeNetMail, PGP, S/MIME, Self Destruct Message (SDM), BitMessages etc . Please check out also our Perks which give you more information about all things you can get. You can choose 3 Levels of your privacy, very easy instant in the browser window with immediate effect. Bitcoin is an innovative payment network and a new kind of money. Bitcoin uses peer-to-peer technology to operate with no central authority or banks; managing transactions and the issuing of bitcoins is carried out collectively by the network. Bitcoin is open-source; its design is public, nobody owns or controls Bitcoin and everyone can take part. Through many of its unique properties, Bitcoin allows exciting uses that could not be covered by any previous payment system. VPS hosting as a cost-efficient solution comes
			right in the middle of dedicated and webspace hosting product ranges 
and provides you with the advantages of both of these types.
			We use a virtualization solution based on KVM and hardware that 
corresponds to the latest state of the art. Furthermore you are provided
 with guaranteed RAM and disk space.
			Customize your virtual private server to suit your needs with the pre installed operating system "Whonix". Whonix is an operating system focused on anonymity, privacy and security. It's based on the Tor anonymity network, Debian GNU/Linux and security by isolation. DNS leaks are impossible, and not even malware with root privileges can find out the user's real IP. Only connections through Tor are possible. Whonix is Free as in price and freedom, lets you run anonymous applications and servers We want also offer some special complete installed Gateways/Router/Firewall for Home/SoHo and Shop solution. Please check out also our Gallery to get more information about the parts we integrate in our system "ICT-Secure" I think is a open secret that only your self take care for your security and you can't trust nobody and nothing. I don't think i need to explain more about, every day you can hear about about the abusing of your privacy in various media's (tv, radio, news paper).  This is way we want install at least ten our own Server around the world to extend the "Tor Cloud project", which gives you a user-friendly way of deploying bridges to help users access an uncensored Internet. We want make 
sure  we can trust them and prevent spying by any country’s, 
organisations or even institutions. We need to install a linux Clusters to improve performance and availability over that of a single computer, while typically being much more cost-effective than single computers of comparable speed or availability and make sure all data are encrypted and secure. We have to develop a very easy User Interface, which gives the facility to install and configure all parts of the system. During the installation process all necessary programs will be installed and configured. We want make sure that there is no need for any manual maintenance and or updates/upgrades, because it's very big need  to be always "updated" to make sure all security and other issues are solved and the system is up to date. Any further development will be integrated with out any action. We use only the most secure implementations of AES, RSA, along with OpenPGP. Furthermore, all of the cryptographic libraries we use are open source. By using open source libraries, we can guarantee that none of the encryption tools we are using have clandestinely built in back doors. We are constantly consulting security experts including IT scientists The first $80,000 will give us enough money to buy and host the servers we need to support all users currently on our waiting list. With some luck, it will be enough for us to get the UI out of beta. This will allow us to introduce paid accounts with additional storage after which the project can be self-sustaining.

description:
Why?

I breed Coturnix Quails in New Zealand. Now quail prefer their space to be warm and toasty or they just go on strike and stop laying eggs. New Zealand winters are neither warm nor toasty, so we have an obvious problem.I've been running a few small crypto mining rigs for months now, and last winter my study was pretty warm through most of the winter, and this got me thinking 'hey I could do this for my quails too'.Commercial BitCoin mining is all but impossible down here because of our high electricity costs that eat into the profits and leave no dividends after normal administrative costs and salaries etc. This is where this operation differs. It has no rent, no salaries or admin expences, and no electricity costs because the mine will run exclusively on off-grid power.

OK, so here's the deal:

I need to keep my birds warm.The bird house is very well insulated, and I could just run heaters on a thermostat again (which I will do as a backup any way), but I would prefer to put that power to good use while achieving the same goal, and come one step closer to taking the farm completely off-grid in the process.The bird house roof has about 70sqm of North facing surface suitable for solar panels.There are currently 2 400W wind turbines on 6m masts that can relatively easily be upgraded to 3.5KW units.I don't need the BitCoin mined, so until all the coins ordered here are delivered I won't be keeping one single Satoshi. Each contract will be paid out on a first-come first-served basis, as the coins are mined, until everyone has been paid.Increases in difficulty will be overcome by retaining 30% of all mined coins for expansion. This will be used exclusively to buy more equipment and increase the rate at which we're able to mine coins. Not a cent will be spent on anything else.Once the last contract is paid out the panels, turbines and other equipment will remain operational on the farm providing us with free electricity for years, and the mining operation will continue to help fund our operation. All the while the quails will be warm and happy.We're trying to create an environment that is pure, organic and fully sustainable, and even though electricity is a vital part of modern life it doesn't need to be provided through dirty processes or be traded as a corporate commodity. This farm will become a haven for WOOFers and volunteers to build memories and experiences, and I feel changing our power source will be a massive step in the right direction.

So where's the money going?

I've decided on using Antminer S5 miners. They have a good hash/power rate, are relatively inexpensive per GH mined, produce a good sustained and fanned heat, and are the perfect size to fit in the spaces available. The miners are the least expensive part of this install though.How many miners I install depends on how much money we raise and how much power is available. Each unit consumes about 590W, so will need at least 1,500W of solar panels, supplemented with wind power, and the controllers and batteries to to manage them. All up each miner with power will cost about $2,000. Obviously unit costs decrease as the project grows.Each miner is currently able to generate about 0.35 BitCoins per month.Although we get a lot of wind, solar with batteries is still more efficient. We'll focus mainly on generating and storing solar power, and at first spend all the money raised on purchasing and installing the appropriate amount of panels to power the maximum amount of miners the money can buy.Once the roof is filled with panels, we'll bring down the existing turbines and upgrade them. Thereafter there is still lots of room for expansion. The main house has over 100sqm of North facing roof, there is space for at least 8 more turbines in moderate to high wind locations, and there are other options available.

Risks & Challenges

This is essentially a futures contract in the highly volatile speculative Bitcoin market. What can go wrong? Well, quite honestly - just about anything.

  • The US government could pull the plug on the Internet, effective rendering the BlockChain useless.
  • The Bitcoin price could inexplicably tumble and your purchase could be worthless before you even receive it.
  • I could desert the farm and disappear without delivering your BitCoins.
  • Lightning could strike one of the turbines burning the entire building to the ground and we lose everything.
  • One of a multitude of other bad things could happen.

I guess it just comes down to trust, and Indigogo's lawyers, and Paypal's refund policy, and New Zealand having some of the strictest consumer laws in the world.

At the end of the day you just need to assess the risks and decide for yourself.

How you'll get paid

People change things, and our BitCoin wallets are no different. The get lost, stolen, or just change purpose over time. So to make sure we're using the right account, we'll be sending out an email to all contributors after the campaign is over, asking which BitCoin address to use for payment. That way there's less room for error. So don't worry about where to enter your account details - we'll sort that all out later.

Other Ways You Can Help

This is a biggie - you probably won't contribute. That's OK. Most people who read this wont, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

Please help get the word out and make some noise about this campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Share a link on Facebook
  • Email just 2 close friends about this
  • Print this page and put it up on a notice board

And that's all there is to it.

description: What is Bitcoin Day Omaha? We are a small group of local Bitcoin lovers. We want to make a difference in people's lives by introducing them to Bitcoin. And if we can do so while helping small businesses in the historic downtown area of Omaha called the Old Market, it's a win-win for everyone. What is Bitcoin? Bitcoin is way more than just a currency, it's a new layer to the internet like email. Never before have two people been able to transmit money over the internet without a bank or middleman confirming it. This new layer to the internet will effect traditional payment systems the same way email effected traditional mail. Before long, everyone will be using Bitcoin like technology for internal and external movement of money because it has 4 huge advantages. It's cheaper It's faster It's more secure It can't be abused to bail-out the "Too Big To Fail" There are a lot of people out there that follow Bitcoin or are curious about it, but they do so in isolation. By putting people with diverse backgrounds, but similar interests together at this one event, we will spawn learning on many different levels about money and freedom. To bring our message to the most people, we need contributions from passionate people like you. Keeping the event free to the public is very important to us, because we don't want a barrier to people getting this valuable education and community experience. What We Need & What You Get We are trying to raise $2000 to cover the cost of the venue, food, and bitcoin prizes. We have a great venue lined up, right in the heart of the Old Market. It was the best fit for a location to run all the day's activities from, and it was the most economical venue, too. If we don't reach our funding goal, it will severally limit our bitcoin prize money first and take-away much of the incentive for people to participate. Our venue costs will be funded first up to $500, and then the bitcoin prizes. If you'd like to donate bitcoin directly, you can do so here: Donate Bitcoins Perks for various levels will include: Branding in all media forms, social, banners, and programs (great for business sponsors) A personal thank you and plug for the sponsors during kickoff intro and the Networking Party Various Old Market area gift cards (great for local individuals) Our help in putting on your own similar event! Schedule 1. Three short informative talks Bitcoin Basics Bitcoin & Beyond Bitcoin Legal Review 2. Omaha Bitcoin Race Hunt for QR codes around the Old Market Multiple ways to win bitcoin prizes 3. Cocktail Hour and Networking Party Really get to know some of the people at the event Get excited by a big reveal for the Omaha area! A successful event for us will be attracting 100+ people and introducing them to Bitcoin and the community. We will get Bitcoin wallets in more hands, and there will be a small about of bitcoin in those wallets to get them started. Your contributions will directly increase the size of the Bitcoin market by attracting more users, and bringing in more people with creative ideas and diverse skills. Omaha has a thriving tech community, and getting them involved with Bitcoin can help the community as a whole! Other Ways You Can Help If you are unable to make a monetary donation, there is still a way you can help! Share our campaign with friends and followers. One of the by-products of this event is that it will serve as a template for other small-to-mid sized cities to put on their own similar events. Tell your Bitcoin Meetups about our efforts and see if they can support us, too. If you are interested in having us help your efforts in your towns, contact us. Brought to you by: and

description:
To tailor to our users and as we are a Bitcoin company we want to make sure that pledgers can pay in Bitcoin. The way this works is that you mark your interest here in good ol' fashioned fiat currency and you pay in bitcoins. This means that you will send the equivalent value in bitcoins and we will return the excess amount once its cleared that sufficient funds are in the account. We will provide detailed instructions on where to send your bitcoins and how its processed as we finalise this round.

Safello started with the simple idea that the market needs a company it can trust. We are your safe fellow by:

The media might have you believe so, but in reality its the exact opposite. Last year over $335m was invested into Bitcoin companies and this trend is set to continue in 2015. Adoption of Bitcoin is growing, here is the latest data from the Coindesk State of Bitcoin 2015 report:

Bitcoin is a groundbreaking invention. Where the Internet changed the way we consume information, Bitcoin is changing the way we use money. And that's just the tip of the iceberg as it has the capability to not only impact the 2.2 billion banked consumers, but also the 2.5 billion unbanked people in the world today that are excluded from the global financial system. It is therefore no surprise that some of the brightest minds are very excited:

(source: http://bitcoinquotations.com/)

Needless to say, Bitcoin is in great company.

To help educate our customers and anyone who is interested in Bitcoin and its potential impact on the global economy, we created a page with hours of video content. If you want to learn even more from an independent source we recommend visiting Bitcoin.org.

Safello connects to banks and Payment Service Providers (PSPs) to make make it easy to purchase bitcoins. Today we support 32 countries through the following payment methods:

On the selling side we have a 7 minute lock to guarantees the price within that time frame.

The mission

We understand that our customers want to use local payment methods. Especially in Europe there are many different preferences where a one-size-fits-all approach does not fit. Our goal is to serve customers globally with local payment methods, which is why we call this our glocal approach.

Bitcoin represents financial freedom and Safello takes this seriously. Our wallet, currently in beta, keeps you in full control of your funds at all times. Even if Safello were to shut down your funds are save and can be restored outside of Safello. An important factor here is that the wallet remains user friendly, we spent a lot of time making it so.

Features include:

The mission

To make this possible we partnered with Blockchain.info, the largest Bitcoin wallet provider in the world. We plan to expand on this philosophy by adding other external wallet and cold storage providers to the Safello platform. User choice and self-control of funds is what we strive for across the board.

It is our firm belief that Bitcoin needs a killer app and we are determined to develop this together with our users. Much of the foundation that serves as a stepping stone to make this possible has been built. Meanwhile we have done our first experiments to spark usage. One of such experiments are our donations pages where we partnered up with charities to create beautifully designed campaigns, you can find them here:

The mission The billion Dollar question on top of everyone's mind is how to get people to use Bitcoin. We believe that this takes time to do and requires tie-ins to other parts of the economy by building Value Added Services (VAS) that deliver something faster, better or cheaper than its equivalents in the traditional financial system. Since the rate of innovation is important here we plan to develop the first VAS ourselves and subsequently open up Safello's platform for others to build on.

So how have we been doing? Pretty good. In fact, January 2015 was our best month ever where we traded almost 3000 bitcoins. Otherwise Safello has been on a roll too, here are our key metrics:

And we're just getting started! In last week of March we will be announcing some news that could significantly improve our position in Europe. In preparation of this news we are shaping up by means of this crowd funding round. By participating in this round you will get the opportunity to join the ranks of our existing investors, some of who are the biggest names in Bitcoin like Roger Ver, Erik Voorhees, Nicolas Cary, Ira Miller and Digital Currency Group.

The funds we are raising are primarily used to expand our team and offering outside of Sweden to better service the European market. We want to double down on localisation of our platform with more payments methods and bank connections to establish a leading position in Europe as a stepping stone to global expansion.

Safello's valuation has been steadily progressing over the last years and we follow this path with today's crowd funding round. To date we have raised ~$860k where the last valuation was set at $8.5m max cap of DCG's convertible in July 2014. Our objective is to continue this route until we can make the shares liquid through an exit or IPO.

International press:

Swedish press:

An investment in Safello is a long term investment in the Bitcoin space. Our vision is to build the bank of the future, one that keeps the customers in control of their money and is ultimately owned by the public. The end goal is financial freedom and convenience. We have built a great fundament from which we can start delivering that value not just to Bitcoin enthusiasts, but more importantly to regular consumers around the world.

Our commitment to our shareholders:

We hope you will join us on our mission to change the world of finance.

On behalf of the entire Safello team,

Frank Schuil CEO & Co-Founder Safello

description: Our Goal With this campaign, we are asking you to help us bring Bitcoin into the mainstream by contributing to get our commercial to air on national TV during this year's Bitcoin Bowl, on ESPN, December 26. Who We Are Love Will Inc., is a self-funded software development company based in Lexington, Kentucky. Our flagship product, Pheeva , was the first Bitcoin wallet released on the App Store, and is now available for Android and Google Chrome Browser. At Love Will we want to make Bitcoin easy for everyone and designed our wallet to be "so simple even Grandma can use it." We are a young group that is passionate about Bitcoin and want to share the technology with as many people as possible. Our first commercial, released this summer, has received incredible feedback from the Bitcoin community and we are now looking to share it with a wider audience. The Bitcoin Bowl is the industry's first big push into the American mainstream and presents a great opportunity for Bitcoin to leave a positive impression on a national audience. We believe that there should be quality Bitcoin specific advertising to complement the game and this moment.  Help us put Bitcoin on national TV in front of an estimated 2 million+ viewers, during this year's Bitcoin Bowl. What We Need and What You Get What we need: $45,000 by December 1, 2014 to secure an advertising spot with ESPN during the Bitcoin Bowl This will ensure that the commercial airs four times during the broadcast, as well as during any future repeat showings of the game. 100% of contributions will go directly to securing the advertising slot with ESPN. You can contribute bitcoins to the campaign by clicking the button above, and you will receive an email receipt confirming your contribution. All Bitcoin contributions will be converted into USD daily through BitPay, and contributed to the Indiegogo campaign. If we do not reach our funding goal, all Bitcoin contributions will be distributed back to the public address we received them from. If you're sending from an HD wallet, please send us an email. What you get: By contributing to this campaign you will play a key role in bringing Bitcoin to the masses on a national scale. Bitcoin has and will always be all about community participation, and this effort is no different. Let's all help bring Bitcoin into the spotlight on the national stage. Consider this Recently social tipping has exploded through outlets such as Reddit, Twitter, and Youtube, and many users see this as a great way to increase exposure to and adoption of Bitcoin. Users donate about $1, and on average, these tips are collected by only 20% of new users. These numbers indicate that the cost of one new user (who may not even purchase more bitcoin) is $5, and the effectiveness of this method is unpredictable. Bitcoin exchanges have been giving out $10 for “new” user acquisition, with no specific knowledge about these users. With a national Bitcoin commercial, the community can reach just as many new, potential Bitcoiners, at a much lower cost to everyone. For example, if nine thousand members of the Bitcoin community contributed $5 each to this campaign, (the same cost to acquire one new member through social tipping), we could successfully fund the commercial and reach over TWO MILLION people. At just over 2 Cents per person, this is one of the most cost effective ways to reach new users and breaks the pattern of internet only Bitcoin advertising. Even if one 1 in 100 viewers look up Bitcoin, it is still one of the most cost effective means of reaching new eyes. The time is now, help us bring Bitcoin to the national stage. Why Us? The task of "bringing Bitcoin into the mainstream", is not something that we take lightly. This is a technology and an industry that we are extremely passionate about, and we believe that we have the best interests of the community in mind as we pursue this goal of bringing Bitcoin to the national stage. With that said here is a little more about us for those who are not familiar with Pheeva: In less than a year, Pheeva has grown into one of the most recognizable brands in Bitcoin. Our wallet has received high praise from new users and experts alike as one of the best, most intuitive wallets in the space. Our Coin!D system makes sending Bitcoin as easy as sending a text or an email, and through our integration with Gyft, users can seamlessly buy digital gift cards to over 200 brands, directly in their wallet.  We believe strongly in empowering true individual ownership of funds, and thus do not hold any users’ private keys. In addition to ease of use, our simple interface is complimented by a robust backend to provide a world-class user experience, security, and reliability. We created the Jacket Wallet for Georgia Tech : the first custom wallet for an American university, and have partnered with BitPay and the College Cryptocurrency Network to scale this model to other universities across the country and abroad. BitPay is sponsoring the Bitcoin Bowl, and will be assisting us in promoting this campaign to the Bitcoin community and beyond. How we'll get the Word Out We will be blasting this campaign across social media outlets with the help of our friends in the Bitcoin community, but we can not bring Bitcoin into the national spotlight without your help. As a self-funded, bootstrapped startup, we understand that not everyone can make a donation, but if you support what we're trying to do please share our campaign through Reddit, Facebook and  Twitter. This is a great opportunity for the entire industry, let's help Bitcoin break into the national scene and get its first national commercial on ESPN! Pheeva Contacts: jeff@pheeva.com lafe@pheeva.com casey@pheeva.com aj@pheeva.com dave@pheeva.com lamar@pheeva.com

description: First let me thank you for taking the time to read this and being interested in Bitcoin. Here is a good introductory video about what Bitcoin is and the process of mining Bitcoin. The problem with Bitcoin is the price. It has gone up and down $50 numerous times within a 24 hour period. Now with the recent price drop several major mining farms have closed. All of them that closed shared the same problem...energy cost. So the obvious question is how can we eliminate the problem of the price of energy? Well, after some research we want to try several options. The first thing we are going to use is the revolutionary technology provided by Bloom Energy. Here is a video about Ebay using Bloom Energy to power their data center in Utah. You can also read about this on Ebay's website tech.ebay.com By signing up with Bloom Energy we will enter into a fixed price for electricity over the next 10 years. This price will be 1/3 of what the going rates are for the local price of electricity. With the money you are donating we want to play it safe and only use the most popular mining computers available. In our experience that would be the miners from Bitmaintech and Spondoolies Tech . After we are operational we want to dedicate a good percentage of our profits to keeping Bitcoin in the market. We are going to continuously buy Bitcoin in hopes of stabilizing the price. Our first mining operation will open in the Los Angeles area. If and when we are successful we want to open another mining operation in Tehachapi, California. The next level of saving on electricity costs would be to go the solar and wind route. Tehachapi, which is an hour and a half north of Los Angeles, has the most successful wind power in the entire state. Tehachapi also has very affordable land which would give us room to grow when we want to implement solar power. Again thank you for taking the time to read this. We truly believe in Bitcoin and what it can mean for the world. Your donations will pay off exponentially.

description:
What is DOLLAR?

DOLLAR is an alternative e-currency similar to Bitcoin with low or no fees, faster transactions, decentralized. The name matters! 

Dollar ($) is the most known currency in the world. The name DOLLAR came from Bohemia where were minted as TOLAR in middle ages.

What We Need & What You Get

We would like to build an ATM network with over 5000 machines. There are only 340 ATMs installed in the world nowadays. Why is the number so low? ATMs are not cheap, prices start at 3000 USD. And Satoshi Nakamoto will not buy it to support his Bitcoin! So, here we are. We can do that!

Can you imagine how the world will change with 5000+ DOLLAR ATMs?

For the start we will install 20 ATMs with your kindly support. The rest of machines will be covered by premined coins. For your help and support you will be rewarded by DOLLAR coins. Please check our Perks and rewards. 

ATM Distribution plan for the next 2 years

Here is a world map where we show you how many DOLLAR ATMs will be installed during years 2015 and 2016.

How DOLLAR ATMs will look like

We have chosen the SUMO Pro (two-ways ATM) produced by BitXatm Technology LLC located in Germany. 

SUMO PRO AD

SUMO PRO Buy - Sell - Point of sale

Who will manage the DOLLAR ATM Network?

We will establish a DOLLAR FOUNDATION which will manage and operate the DOLLAR ATM Network together with local e-currencies representatives. 

What e-currencies will be listed in ATMs?

Basically, ATMs will serve exchange (two-ways) for Bitcoin and DOLLAR. When the ATM machine will be located e.g. in Great Britain it will accept local e-currencies.

List of currencies:

  • Great Britain (BRIT, SLG)
  • Germany (DEM)
  • Czech Republic (CZC, CZE)
  • Netherlands (NLG)
  • Poland (PLN)
  • Spain (PTC)
  • and others ...
Do you want to have your coin available in DOLLAR ATMs too? Please write us a short email about your coin and send it to info (at) edollar.international. Perks and rewards

For your help we will send you DOLLAR coins directly to your DOLLAR wallet. The perks you see on the right site. Please in the payment notice write down your DOLLAR address (e.g. DFi5676BD3VcjyAscLHW8oyJomxeScgcP2). For the reward we use the exchange rate + 10% bonus.

Wallet download:  WIN  $  MAC  $  LINUX

The DOLLAR wallet future

We plan only the best for the wallet. We intend to implement funcionalities as voice chat, video chat, file sharing etc. during this year.

Other Ways You Can Help

SHARE THE IDEA! Send it to your friends & family, share it on FB, tweet about it etc. There is a lot of noise out there, so any support will be VERY WELCOME!!

You can easily start by clicking the share tools on this page.

Thank you for reading our story and for your support.

description:
Datum : 12 Úno, 2014

Na světě se poslední dobou objevily stovky různých virtuálních měn - deriváty Bitcoinu. Lidi je zakládají z různých důvodů; někdo to dělá proto aby zbohatl, protože ten kdo začně nejdřív bude mít nejvíc coinů. Jiní to dělají, protože nesouhlasí s některými principy Bitcoinu, například počtem vytěžených peněz, či s algoritmem hashování. Příkladem budiž Litecoin, Namecoin, Novacoin, Feathercoin, Peercoin, nebo Primecoin. Všechny jmenované mají jedno společné - před pár měsíci o nich skoro nikdo neslyšel a teď stojí jedna jejich jednotka na burze 5 až 20 dolarů. Nyní se na scéně objevila nová měna - dogecoin a o té bude tenhle blog.
Doge
Prvně by se nejspíš slušelo vysvětlit koncept doge memu. Jedná se o obrázky, kde hraje hlavní roli pes rasy Shiba inu (shibe).
(Shibe doge)   
V podstatě se to dá shrnout do třech variant:
Interní monolog
Do obrázku jsou přidány interní monology, tak jak by si je mohl představovat pes. Společným jmenovatelem jsou barvičky, comic sans, schválně špatný pravopis (něco jako catspeak) a nadužívání nadšených výrazů jako such, wow, very, many, so atp..

description: Our Story... By now you have probably heard about Bitcoin whether it be in the news or finance magazines, watching " The Good Wife " or "Almost Human" with your partner, or maybe you're already active in the Bitcoin Community. Point is, if your eyes have been open, you've heard about Bitcoin by now.  Hint, it's catching on, it's growing.  It's THE next big thing. Bitcoin Alchemy was started by three friends, John Drummond, Aaron Kirsch, and Perry Lucas , to help elevate Bitcoin and its services to a professional level and engage them by identifying gaps that exist today and operating our infrastructure in a professional manner.  our ultimate goal is to see this industry flourish and revolutionize banking much the same way the Internet transformed communication.  20 years ago we all scoffed at Google. We said, "What's Facebook?" for months before it became a major part of our lives. We're not scoffing at Bitcoin.  It's here and it's revolutionizing international currency the way Amazon revolutionized online shopping. While we have big ideas, like a cryptocurrency asset tracking system and an advanced state of the art visualization and interaction system, we fully understand that we need to have a firm ground in reality with an infrastructure that can sustain us for our long term development goals.  Therefore, we are starting with what we know best; a precious metals for Bitcoin store and cryptocurrency profit switching mining pools.We're not just doing those as yet another mining pool, but integrating those services so miners have more of an incentive to stay with us. Think of us as "your one stop click" when it comes to Bitcoin. Nobody else has hopped in this bandwagon so we like to think we're pioneers here. One site to mine, earn, track, buy, invest... this like the bank of the your dreams except we're not giving away toasters with new accounts.  Buy hey, we'll consider adding them as perks if you give us feedback about it. As it currently stands, Bitcoin Alchemy is the first mining pool that we know of in the US to be a Limited Liability Corporation and completely transparent about its ownership and intent.  That's a big deal to us. It shows you that we're regular people, not just eggheads coding 24/7 with no idea what the average Joe is going to want or need.  We are a Silver member of the Bitcoin Foundation so that we at least have returned something to the Bitcoin community and have a vice in its direction. In addition, we intent to donate 5% of our profits to charity. More on that later. While we currently only ship bullion products to US addresses, our intent is to offer international shipping, where permitted, in the near future. Why We're Here... Right now, we need to get the word out that Bitcoin Alchemy is entering the market with our beta.  We are looking to raise $50,000 to help optimize our website and build Bitcoin Alchemy's presence in the community. Our initial marketing campaign will target community based websites such as Bitcoin Talk , Reddit , and several other community forums and websites. We'd like to be able to start running ad campaigns not only targeting our customers but to also become a central resource for those looking to learn more. We're not just for the veteran Bitcoin miner, we're trying to open up to noobs, to everyone that's heard of Bitcoin and wants to learn more and maybe even give it a try. Bitcoin Alchemy is a great place to begin. We know that not everyone is a cryptocurrency miner that has a room full of mining rigs and ASICs. You don't have to be that guy to benefit from Bitcoin Alchemy. We're for EVERYONE. The advertising campaign we desperately need to launch should allow us to generate sufficient interest in our mining pools that will cover our continuing operating and development costs. We know we're on to something here. We just need a little help bringing our mind blowing ideas to the next level. If our goals aren't met, what we do receive will still help us continue our development goals and organically spread the word about Bitcoin Alchemy's services. Anything counts and it all helps. Like the Internet was in the early '90s, John, Aaron, and Perry truly believe that Bitcoin is the next big disruptive technology.  $25,000 of their own money has gone into developing the platform so far and there is a lot more to do. Our Challenges... Our biggest risk is not trying at all. Many of our competitors are anonymous hobbyists that have built limited function mining pools that are not evolving to address and adhere to new regulations appearing across the globe. The advantage they have though is they have been around awhile and we are the new kid on the block. It's going to take time and effort to convince the community we are serious and trustworthy. Our Bigger Goals... $100,000 Dedicated Server and storage infrastructure to collect, store, and present all relevant public data from multiple exchanges and other sources. $150,000 Full time DBA, Frontend Web Developer, and Mobile App development team. We have lots of ideas, and we want to implement them. $250,000 One enterprise grade API interface to rule them all. Our goal is to ingest data from multiple services, and present it back in a single unified API interface.  We will also fill in the gaps that some of these services do not currently provide themselves today (historical data being a big one). $350,000 Advanced data visualizations and manipulation. Beyond upgrading and implementing our charts and graphs with a more robust (and eye candy) solution, we have some Sci-Fi ideas that we would like to explore to build a new visualization and interaction platform with. Other Ways You Can Help If you are cryptocurrency miner, please start mining with us! We promise to keep on developing and responding to community feedback to keep making ourselves better. Please tell your friends and family and spread the word!! We'd beg you but we've been told that's unbecoming. We considered showing GIFS of cats on Roombas but we're trying not to be cheesy.  So please, mine with us and spread the word.

description:
POUR LA VERSION FRANCAISE, CONSULTEZ WWW.SYNAPSE-LABS.FR

IOTA (noun) : The very first complete media center that is also a Bitcoin relay, rewarding you in bitcoins.

PC/Mediacenter acting as Bitcoin relay : IOTA

// IOTA - THE HARDWARE

Personal multimedia computer.

Dimensions : L20cm x L20cm x H5cm

Specifications :

- Intel i3 processor 17W low consumption / high performance

- MSATA64Go (+ HDD 1To) - RAM4G

- HD Intel Series Graphic card

- 802.11ac Wifi

- Infrared remote control

- Gigabit LAN

- 4xUSB3 – 2xUSB2

- HD Audio line IN/OUT

- VGA – HDMI 1.4

The IOTA box is black brushed-aluminum, with a contemporary world-class design perfect for any home office or living room, produces no noise (0db) and consumes only 30 watts.

              

// IOTA - THE SOFTWARE

Where your mediacenter becomes and entertainment center !

IOTA is ready for use, out-of-the-box, and connects to any TV by the standard HDMI. IOTA integrates the Kodi® Entertainment Center (known previously as XBMC™) the most useful and most successful mediacenter.

Access your digital data from any virtual source, including CD, DVD, USB drive, Internet and LAN. Connect to the Internet Movie Database or CDDB to retrieve cinema, video and music information. The IOTA software also offers the possibility of streaming videos and Internet radio, including Shoutcast and Last.fm or Spotify®!

Your IOTA system offers an all-in-one, music, photo library management and video center enabled for a long list of video codecs and formats.

This flexible interface is fully customizable and is adaptable to multiple application. Thanks to linux and Kodi® technology, additional online modules are available, including: film trailer and radio modules, subtitle services, CD art and video art management, as well as access to YouTube, Facebook, and Twitter.

NB: Neither IOTA nor Kodi® provide media content.

Music

IOTA can play most all audio formats, but also arrange and manage your music files in a comprehensive library. Your music library allows search by artists, genre, or year. Through its Internet connection, IOTA can even display the lyrics of your favorite songs.

Movies

IOTA allows you to import, browse, and play your videos from any source connected to, or networked with IOTA! Via third party plugins, IOTA supports all video formats and live video streaming.

TVShows

Create a library by saving your favorite TV shows stored on an internal or external drive, as well as from your shared server. IOTA allows organisation of your favorite shows by season and episodes and keeps track of the shows you’ve watched, so you always know where you left off.

Streaming Channels

Access hundreds of live TV channels as well as VOD like Netflix !

Photos

Import your images into your IOTA library and browse through the different views available. Right from your couch, using your remote, you can build a slideshow or categorize and organize all of your photos.

Weather

Display weather data of your location and your favorite cities ! 

Interface customization

Create your own categories with an intuitive and fully customizable interface! Add some widgets or create your own submenus, everything is possible with IOTA!

Addons

                 

You can always add functionality to your multimedia experience from your sofa or anywhere else ! Kodi® is an open source software for which a community of web developers constantly create new features. A wide selection of plugins are available through various portals, and addons are available from most web services.

UPNP (Universal Plug and Play)

With its UPnP compatibility, you can share from/to IOTA. This universal network protocol, allows you to enjoy and share your media to or from any mobile device or computer on your local wireless or Ethernet network.

IOTA is also Airplay ready.

WHY IOTA ?

IOTA is a technology born of the demand to strengthen and support the rapidly increasing number of transactions over the Bitcoin network. Our technology will achieve this by an even distribution of Bitcoin relays around the globe. By multiplying the number of relays throughout the world, the transmission time of Bitcoin transactions will decrease from the present delay of minutes, to just seconds.

Bitcoin is a decentralized digital cash system, that differs from all state currencies as bitcoins are not produced by a central bank, but are generated by a digital process called ‘mining’, which takes place in hundreds of datacenters throughout the world, called mining farms. One bitcoin today trades at 241.2 USD, and is created as a reward for payment processing work.

All Bitcoin miners offer their computing power to verify and record payments into the public ledger. These users are rewarded with new bitcoins proportional to the amount of computing power they donate to the network. 

But the public Bitcoin network is also made up of merchants, exchangers, users and other relay nodes. These are essential members of the network who are not compensated for securing and strengthening the network. 

Your IOTA mediacenter is a paid Bitcoin relay.

To strengthen Bitcoin it is necessary to spread evenly around the globe a great number of transaction relays.

// THE REWARD

When IOTA is ON whether you use it or not it acts as a relay and you get paid !

How ? In bitcoins.

How often ? Daily.

How much is worth one bitcoin ? today: ~$242 USD.

Can you trade it ? yes (www.bitstamp.net).

What could i buy with bitcoins ? Whatever you want or need.How much IOTA pays you ?

The goal of the node is to be online 24/7 and thus can relay transactions in its perimeter. 

By default, IOTA will only use 100kbits/sec IN and OUT (10% of an average dsl line OUT) ~1Mbits/sec).

Thus, the user letting IOTA switched on will be rewarded as a Bitcoin miner owning around 150GH/s mining power. A miner with this computing speed will get rewarded around 1 bitcoin among 36 months*, knowing the payments are on daily basis : 0,001BTC or 100000 Satoshi per day. (One Satoshi is the tiniest fraction of a Bitcoin (0,00000001BTC)).

How does it work ? 

You create a Bitcoin wallet on a platform like Blockchain.info / Coinbase / Paymium ( France ). You fill your Bitcoin wallet address (account number ) in your IOTA interface. See a daily payment satoshis on your interface against part of the  uptime of your IOTA .

It can stay always on because its power consumption is reduced below 30W. IOTA still acts as a relay during media player sessions and do not affect in any way your experience.

IOTA will not mess with your internet bandwidth or your DslTV broadcast because you can set a limit in the usage of your your connection

IOTA’s custom interface will show you the hosted Bitcoin Core activity. It will display the status of the node and activity surrounding it : blockchain size, connected pairs, total bitcoins mined, total number of bit coin nodes, and more…

Today (2015/05/19) one bitcoin can be bought around 240$, its value went from $00 in 2009 to over $1000 in november 2013.

What will 1 bitcoin earned with IOTA be worth in 3 years ?

* estimate of total awards received between 04/15/2015 and 04/15/2018

Who are we ?

IOTA is supported by the business startup, Synapse Labs. 

www.synapse-labs.fr 

The Synapse Labs is a team of six community-oriented, multimedia specialists and crypto-currency enthusiasts aiming to share the success and benefits of free software through innovative products and services to as many people as possible.

With over 15 years experience, our team at Synapse Labs works passionately to leverage our competence in systems integration and security, network engineering, the graphic and media arts, and in all Internet technologies.

Our primary objective is to strengthen Bitcoin and make the Bitcoin network more efficient, multiplying the number of active bitcoin relays by distributing a maximum number of units across the globe.

Secondly, we offer IOTA users exclusive services and both additional software and hardware features to make the most of the system’s potential.

Why do we need your help ?

The IOTA project is a community vision, and it is as a community that the IOTA System will succeed. It is in this spirit of community that we are initiating our crowd-funding campaign with INDIEGOGO to raise funds for the completion of the IOTA Project and secure the manufacture of the IOTA box.

The aim of the campaign is to finance the production and delivery of 200 IOTA boxes, in order to have a primary beneficial impact on the health of the Bitcoin network, and to enable the distribution of a larger number of units. For this we have established our first level goal of $ 65000 (60 000 €).

The first 100 IOTA units will be available at the exclusive price of $299 USD.

The next 200 units will be available at $359 USD, as a special price before market availability to the public.

Once available to the general public, the IOTA mediacenter will be priced at $379 USD.

A small precision : IOTA will be made in France.

THE ROAD MAP:

yesterday, today and tomorrow

March 2014 - A growing demand for the Bitcoin Relay

June 2014 - Birth of IOTA concept : 

Reward for Bitcoin Relay supply through a competitive multimedia product.

October 2014 - 

Proof of concept IOTA, version 0.1, achieves marriage of hardware and software

December 2014 - Design for IOTA 1.0

February 2015 - IOTA is out of the box-ready

March 2015 - First prototype goes into production

May 2015 - IOTA appears on the web and in social networks!

Finance campaign began ! May 19 2015

May 2015 - Refined interface and production model finalized

June 2015 - Final testing and certification.

August 2015 - The first 100 units of the IOTA Mediacenter go into production.

September - October 2015

Deliver the first 200 units and launch production of next 100 units of IOTA mediacenter.

December 2015 - Further development of new IOTA modules:

- wireless (inductive) charging station

- home surveillance caméra

- home air quality detector

- DECRYPTION - lexicon

Encrypted Currency

Often called crypto currency is a medium of exchange and electronic payment using cryptography to secure the transactions and to control the creation of new monetary units.

BlockChain

A distributed data store that holds a public ledger of transactions in cryptocurrencies. This record is enforced cryptographically and hosted on machines running the software.

P2P or Peer to Peer

P2P is a distributed, non-centralized information network in which there is no single server containing the exchanged data. The data is divided and distributed among several copies to all network clients.

BTC, XBT, mBTC, µBTC

The abbreviated currency code for the bitcoin is BTC or XBT. BTC is an informal acronym as with most crypto-currencies and XBT is the acronym validated by ISO standards. As bitcoins have appreciated in value, it has become increasingly common to work with thousandths or even millionths of bitcoins, which are called millibitcoins (mBTC) and microbitcoins (μBTC), respectively.

Satoshi

The smallest unit, a hundred millionth of a bitcoin (0.00000001 bitcoin), is called a satoshi in honor of Satoshi Nakamoto

0,00000001BTC.

ASIC

ASIC stands for Application-Specific Integrated Circuit, which is a microchip designed for a special application. In crypto-currencies, ASICs are used to solve a mining puzzle algorithm, for example, SCRIPT or SHA-256.

Mining

This refers to the actual creation of currency by the solving of the mining puzzle algorithm.

Hash

The term «hashing» means how quickly your hardware is processing data from the Blockchain. A hash algorithm turns an arbitrarily-large amount of data into a fixed-length hash. The same hash will always result from the same data, but modifying the data by even one bit will completely change the hash. Like all computer data, hashes are large numbers, and are usually written as hexadecimal.

GH/S - Gigahashes/sec

The number of hashes calculated in a second. This measures the power of a component or ASIC network.

“Mining farms”

Large spaces (buildings) combining a number of ASIC generating units blasting powers of the order of Petahash (1000000GH).

description:
Flexvee is a concept developed by Finnish company Neonella Oy. Flexvee makes interactivity possible while watching TV programs and videos. The concept also rewards you for these activities. It also allows money transactions and payments within the content. The technology of Flexvee can also be used in the traditional display marketing for example in banners. Neonella's Flexvee concept is a unique way to make business and it hasn't identiﬁed any direct competitors. Flexvee concept is unique because it allows rewarding and money transactions with-in interactive content. World's most famous virtual currency bitcoin is used in the concepts point and loyality system and in the money transfers. Bitcoins can be used in tens of thousands of online stores around the world. More info on Bitcoins here You may read the articles in the links below: Bloomberg Fidest Ghanaweb Global net monitor Global net monitor Flexvee concept can also be used as part of the traditional online marketing, for example, in internet banners in which case they are called as “Flexvee Smart banners” The concept brings significant value for each operating party, as well as many possibilities for new business models. • Flexvee Smart banner draws more attention than a regular banner • Rewarding and interactivity brings more customer commitment • Flexvee smart banner collects information from the users and can be compared to customer survey or market research • Rewarding customers leaves a positive image of the advertising company • Makes it possible to sell products, hand out samples and making new customer contacts while advertising Through its partner Riemurasia Flexvee reaches more than 500.000 identified and registered users in Finland, as well as over a million visitors in weekly basis. Neonella and Riemurasia joined as business partners in November 2014. Flexvee is a unique way of doing business, and there are no competitor with similar concepts in the market. • Users are rewarded with virtual currency when participating • Allows the use of services for free with earned virtual currency • Rewarding improves consumer interest and commitment towards services and products • Allows gambling and betting along TV programs and video content • Improves the collection of data in marketing research and is about 70-90% less expensive than traditional marketing and consumer research • Brings payments and money transfers into interactivity. • The service allows the use of mobile money instead of bitcoins. Mobile currencies are very popular in Africa. Read the article about mobile money in Africa here The features mentioned above bring dozens of new business opportunities that can be used by, for example. media companies and telecom operators, as well as their partners. The need for internet-TV in Africa Due to the current analog system and the small number of TV receivers, the transition to digital broadcasting networks pose significant challenges for media companies in Africa. Internet services are used almost exclusively for mobile devices. Demand is particularly in distribution of mobile-TV content but the media companies do not have skills to execute them.
Both consumers and the TV-media companies are suffering from the situation. Companies need more customers to increase revenue from media income and consumers need a wider range of Internet TV services. The number of mobile users, in all continents, is growing fastest in Africa. Uganda, Tanzania, Ethiopia and Zambia have a total of 114 million mobile subscriptions and the whole of Africa has over 900 million mobile subscriptions. The number of smart-devices is growing rapidly; about 40-50% a year, being at the moment at about 20% of all mobile devices. Operatin in the African market requires a good local knowledge and networks. Neonella Ltd´s. strategic partner in Africa is Somocon Ltd. Somocon has already pre-established partner networksin the line of business. Somocon Ltd consultants are familiar with African business culture and local knowledge can be found in the very countries which Flexvee concept and format is being delivered. The entire system has been developed in cooperation with the local partners to specifically serve the needs of Africa. There is also a need for European know-how regarding the technical aspects. Neonella's advantage in Africa is it's revenue share business model, in which the cooperation can start without the customer making a significant pre-investment. Competing suppliers require a significant financial investment from their customers before the service can be started. With this simple and quick-to-implement technology it´s possible to start the project that enables a quick start of the cash flow, without either party having a need to invest capital in the costs of the initial introduction of the system. Somocon Ltd has acquired customers for Neonella, that are either in pilot- or commercial stage.The countries are: Uganda, Tanzania, Ethiopia and Zambia. There are ongoing negotiations with over 20 different partners. So far, we have developed the following: Future development: Neonella offers investors the opportunity to benefit from the increased value of the company within a few years. Market Sectors and geographical areas, to which Neonella is concentrating on, are growing rapidly. Flexvee concept is very cost effective and it provides greater increase in value on all stages of production, than other current marketting methods. Africa is a very challenging market, that Neonella Ltd. manages to great success with the local partnerships. Business Start-up in Africa on the field of Neonella Ltd., is difficult for competitors, due to the closed computer networks and expensive cross-border roaming fees in African countries Where Neonella needs funds? Neonella need financing primarily for delivery a pilot to Africa and the system management development. Neonella shall deliver several interactive internet TV systems in Africa. Since Neonella’s developed system has just been completed and therefore we still need users’ experiences, in general the delivering of the system in African markets has been done under a Letter of Intent. The Letter of Intent is first conditional and it becomes binding when the system is delivered and the commercial operation can begin. After the commercial operation has been launched, the income for Neonella also begins. In addition, the need for the development of the Flexveen management system is needed in order that it can be automated and easily to use, even without any IT experience or knowledge. In all, Neonella is looking for funding for the first quarter of 2015 for development 200.000 euros and for other operating expenses 100,000 euros. The essential income from Flexvee will start to roll in the first quarter of 2015. Neonella is offering to its investors a huge increase in value already in few years. (Based on the actual share’s transactions, Neonella’s value has increased over the last three years, from 700,000 euros to 4.8 million euros.) The markets that Neonella is aiming are predicted to have a very strong growth. A new way of marketing is needed in to provide consistently cost-effective solutions. The risks in investing in Neonella are reduced by the facts that Neonella has the business related to subcontracting in programming, the development of interactive mobile TV which is very important in African markets, as well as new forms of digital advertising that can scales globally. Nevertheless Neonella does not want to downplay the risks of a start-up type investments include without exception.
